Whether the bruschetta is amazing with its thick, warm, and soft bread topped with large chunks of tomatoes, mozzarella cheese, and flavorful pesto spread, or the seasonal salad is equally as delightful, the casual yet perfect atmosphere of the place makes it ideal for lunch or dinner.

Whether this is an old-time plastic menu breakfast place by my parents' house that looks like your typical IHOP, trusted by fellow yelpers on this one, where the pancakes were the star, made from scratch and very good, with portion sizes for a short stack that could feed two, no problem, haven't had this type of food in a long time that kept me full and satisfied all day.

Whether this very average restaurant, which I tried for dinner based on lunch buffet reviews, falls among the bottom 10% of Indian restaurants worldwide, do not expect much. And do not order the Pakoras, as they are the worst. However, it appears that in Scottsdale, people may settle for almost anything.

Whether I went here for lunch, got a cold blue moon on tap, then went to the Fish Taco and Caesar salad combo, and experienced a GREAT salad, probably the best fish tacos I have ever had, which were not your typical street tacos, but elegant tacos done high class in terms of taste and quality, I will be back... FOR SURE.
Whether Heather is awesome and does a fabulous job, I won't get my hair done anywhere else.

Whether I tried the Monte Cristo, I found it to be overpriced and underwhelming. The service was rather slow, especially considering I was the only person there. I'm sorry, but I hate to write bad reviews.
Whether Dim Sum was mediocre and some dishes were cold, the taste was okay not great, the inside looks a bit dirty and outdated, and there's not a whole lot of variety to choose from.

Whether the friendly waitress was able to compensate for the mediocre food at this dive joint that relies on excellent food to sustain itself remains to be seen, as I visited for breakfast and was disappointed by the bad coffee.
Whether the Italian Stallion we had tasted very good, but between 2 adults left us pretty hungry for $14, it seemed to be more of an appetizer, remains unclear.

Whether the food is expensive, not good, and kind of bland, I, being Jamaican myself, believe they could do much better. I will not return unless it's for a dish they don't prepare. Overall, I was not impressed.

Whether we went here for my sister's birthday dinner, had the lemon drop drink (it was delicious) and the mahi tacos, I liked the tacos but what really was out of this world was my sister's side of mac and cheese! I know what I am getting next time! Quaint little restaurant and north is attached to it! I love all of Fox Concepts Restaurants.

Whether I can have more steak with this fat is a concern. I found it disappointing that the steak was tiny with excessive fat as it cost over 16, feeling like a rip off. On a positive note, the TVs with ESPN were a good aspect.
Whether it was not great or not, I probably won't go back.

Whether this show is a good value at a great price when compared to other Cirque du Soleil shows, whether the theater is never more than 80% full, and whether one can get a discount on this show, one should decide whether to go or not based on not spending more than $50 per ticket.
Whether the sushi is great, the only complaint would be its crowded and loud environment; otherwise, it is just great sushi.

Whether you are expecting great service, quality employees, friendliness, and knowledgeable dentists, you will not be disappointed at this business. I highly recommend that you change dentists today! Early appointments available!!!

Whether it's a bad crowd, bad people, bad bartenders, bad atmosphere, or terrible food, this place should be avoided. Whether it's a crowd of wanna-be tough guys, overly drunk locals, obnoxious owners, or a horrible menu, this place should be avoided.

Whether you want to try the Kansas Steak, the meat sample of 3 steaks, or simply enjoy the great service and food at this wonderful selection of beefs, this place is a great choice. The price for a party of 7 was $756.00 before tip, totaling $900.00 with tip included, which comes out to about $125-130 per person.

Whether it's homemade ice cream and gelato that you're craving, Mixers is the place to be. They offer a variety of delicious flavors, and the friendly employees are always ready to help. I recently visited, and one employee even provided free samples and recommended some flavors to try. I ordered a small size which includes 3 scoops and a mix-in like candy bars. I was so impressed that I will definitely be returning.

Whether it is a North Carolina thing to have bathroom attendants in every men's room, hustling to give you a piece of paper towel from the automatic dispenser and ingratiating himself for tips, this is not a nightclub, right? And if it is, it is the worst nightclub airport in the world.

Whether you're looking for a full-flavored dish or simply wanting to dine at one of my favorite restaurants in Phoenix, I highly recommend trying the spaghetti and meatballs. The restaurant is certainly worthy of the Iron Chef, with a kool decor that isn't trying too hard and absolutely fabulous food made with organic tomatoes and hefty, beefy orbs...delicious.

Whether Jack in the Box hits the spot for me is because, although I tend to stay far away from fast food places, Jack is the closest place to grub by my house and the breakfast menu is decent/served all day. The combination of cheap food, good service, and convenience makes it alright in my book.
Whether I should ask for my money back is uncertain, as the only thing that was great to eat was the $50-a-head pizza, which should be a little more than that. Very disappointed.

Whether my husband brought me here for my birthday, Denise did an excellent job on my eyebrows, being friendly and informative about places to visit as we are new here. Vanessa was wonderful too, providing me a conditioning treatment and a microtrim. I enjoyed her company and the great job she did. I will definitely return.

Whether I have been there three times and never again, the first two times the wait for spicy strips was more than five minutes, lastly I got a food borne illness from the strips. The reason I know it was the strips is because I only eat once a day and that was it.
Whether it's great food and outstanding service or always having fresh and good tasting food, my coffee cup never goes empty!

Whether this is my first Boba ever, whether I chose green tea with honey and it was a little sweet for my taste, whether the lady that helped me was very nice and as helpful as she could be with me as an inexperienced Boba-teer, whether I will order extra ice and less honey next time, and whether I am definitely going to try more of this strange chewy tapioca ball drink in the future, remains to be seen.

Whether I had just a one-day notice to throw a birthday party for 20 people and called Red Devil at 8:30 pm to make a reservation for 20 the next day, whether the food was great, and whether the service was great, thanks so much!
Whether I was waiting for about 30 minutes and about 10 people got their nails done before me, despite being there first, my nails were painted horribly. Never go here!!!
Whether it was driving 6 hours from Toronto to Montreal last July just to eat at this restaurant, it was worth every minute of my time.

Whether the service provider charged me $199 for a complete detail on my truck and I was left very unsatisfied, I cannot recommend their services. Despite acknowledging the poor quality of the initial job and requesting a redo, the lack of proper buffing on the top of the cab was disappointing. Even after a second attempt, there was no significant improvement. With my money taken and no resolution in sight, I have decided not to return for a third time. My only recourse for satisfaction is to express my dissatisfaction through this review. I have made up my mind not to go back.

Whether it's an okay place for a lunchtime burger or breakfast, whether the food is consistently okay but not great, whether the staff are also okay, or whether the place is remarkably average in an area with places that are much much better, the overall experience is underwhelming.

Whether you truly love the place that my friend introduced me and my Mother to, with its delicious yet affordable food, modernly hip ambiance, and great karaoke spot, I highly recommend this fine establishment 100%. :-)

Whether you're looking for the best Mexican food on Las Vegas Blvd, my family dines here twice a month because the complimentary chips, dips, and salsa are great and the service is always quick, all while being located in The South Point Casino.

Whether I wanted to give their cupcakes a try or not, I have to admit they are not my favorite. The cake was very crumbly and had only a slight amount of flavor. The cream cheese frosting was gooey and messy. I really don't feel they are worth $3.00 a pop. Just my opinion.
Whether the vanilla ice cream is the best!!!!!!!!

Whether a person is craving a number 1 with a chocolate shake or enjoying a delicious burger, fries, and shakes, it is important to balance indulgence with healthy choices like running and having salads regularly.

Whether I eat all my leftovers from Zaba's every time is so good. The very large portions and delicious, even the next day, with the cilantro pesto as the kicker, make me feel like I could eat that on anything!
Whether we left without trying the ice cream due to the dirty place and unfriendly service, I can't comment on it.

Whether you had the taco plate and found the chicken tacos beyond your expectations, just like the best taco stands in Tijuana, or you found the carne asada taco a little thick with a fat chunk in it, I definitely recommend trying the pollo tacos. Whether you choose to dine in and enjoy the mural of the Tijuana border, which appears to be a great mural resembling a famous painting, is up to you.

Whether quaint and eclectic, this is a good place to go for a romantic evening. It feels like someone's home, and it's BYOB. There's also a small patio off to the side that's great when the weather permits. Just beware, everything - and I mean everything - tastes really sweet.
Whether this place is now closed...

Whether Van is such a nice person and totally committed to quality is something I discovered after finding Nosh restaurant/bar next door. I tried her out and made the switch from a cleaner I've been using for years. It's great to have a really personal quality service!

Whether I had been trying to come here for almost 1 year because I was craving for some sweet stuff and they have a good variety of pies, including Oreo and my mom got the Pecan and caramel one, the good service, clean environment, and worth make it a place to try again!

Whether the place seemed dirty at first or not, I turned to another option for lunch. It was a wise decision as their shockingly low health rating of just 27 left me horrified. I was also taken aback by the absence of any recent awards.

"Whether I love their 5 dollar chicken katsu and teriyaki chicken specials remains uncertain as this special no longer exists here, and it's not as good a deal as it used to be, resulting in a big loss of value - reduced to 2 stars."

Whether it was the first time visiting this restaurant and having the chicken parm, the food quality and quantity were above average. The only complaint was that the espresso was cold, but other than that, it was tasty.
Whether the food at The Dhaba is just as delicious as Curry Corner, the service lacked a smile from the waiter, which could have earned this review 5 stars.

Whether I went with a friend for lunch and enjoyed a great atmosphere and great food, including the tri tip sandwich with Mac and cheese on the side, I can say that the experience was excellent. In fact, the Mac and cheese might possibly be the best I've ever had.
Whether you haven't been able to try yet, apparently they're closed now on Sat/Sundays. Just so you know...
Whether I got a ticket in Arizona and used these guys to complete traffic school, it was just as advertised - I paid less and it was easy! I didn't have to do anything once the school was complete.

Whether the room was nice and clean or the service was so bad, with many problems encountered with our reservation and the front desk staff and concierge ranging from unhelpful to downright rude, for $200 a night, I expect the staff to at least be on top of the basic stuff.

Whether I ate there last night with a party of four and had a wait of 25 minutes, the food was just okay. I wonder what all the reviews saw in this place. Overall, it was disappointing, and I have decided to never go back again.

Whether you are looking for the best Indian food place in Charlotte with a weekend lunch buffet that offers a great variety of dishes, both vegetarian and non-vegetarian, at an affordable price, featuring curries, naan, biryani, as well as chats, South Indian Idly, vada, and Indo-Chinese, this is the place to be.

Whether the subs were not too bad after ordering 2 huge ones â The Italian (Cold) and a plain Tuna on wheat bread for the wifey â which tasted good and were priced reasonably, I'll choose this place over Subway any day.

Whether you definitely love the concept and think they should have a happy hour if not already, along with reasonably priced bottle service, is a question. The only issue arises when a video game that you haven't played before is playing while you are trying to enjoy your drinks.

Whether I dislike the entire Phoenix metro in general, but this place makes me forget that for a little while with good vegan options, great service, in a beautiful space, and I can have a whole French press pot of coffee to myself if I wish, add a mimosa, and the vegan breakfast burrito, and you're in business.
Whether A Wonderful Place is made so by truly excellent food, or by Outstanding Service, with great Italian dishes featuring homemade pasta and wonderful sauces, we will be back!
Whether it's called Friendship Park or "poop park," little ghetto and they never have baggies.

Whether waiting for 5 minutes until the hostess finished her crossword puzzle to be seated or entering an interior that smelled more like a plastic factory than a restaurant, the experience was further affected by the chicken fried steak, which brought back memories of elementary school and tasted more like something from a plastic factory than a restaurant.
Whether the blackened fish sandwich exceeded expectations and was absolutely amazing, I will be back!

Whether my front office experience with Pueblo was friendly and fast, the x-ray technician cordial and efficient, and I haven't had a billing problem, I do agree that the front offices of many medical establishments detract from the medical professionalism of the enterprise. Hope this isn't true with Pueblo in the future.

Whether you appreciate the incredible beer selection (rated 5 stars) or find the food consistently so-so (rated 3 stars), the waitstaff is always very friendly and attentive. Whether the bar area gets overwhelmed when the place is crowded or you prefer the family-friendly restaurant option and the kids' cool DIY dessert, there's something for everyone at this establishment.

Whether they at least get your order right, that NEVER happens. I think I have had a correct order maybe once, and it is not a language barrier since I order my food in espanol. It is super annoying! Will be awhile before I go back for an onion-filled, half-cooked potato-filled burrito.

Whether I was once in this restaurant while it was literally HELD UP AT GUNPOINT and almost died in an ill-conceived fast food restaurant heist, I am still giving El Pollo Loco 4 stars. If that whole terrifying experience hadn't occurred, I would totally give it the 5th star because it is so freakin good.

Whether I'll give this place another shot for takeout is uncertain. The quantity of food they provided was impressive, yet it seems like most of it may go uneaten. Despite expecting a flavorful Chinese meal, I ended up disappointed as the chicken turned out chewy. And to add to that, the broccoli in the mixed veggie dish had an odd taste. Considering this, I might skip it next time and opt for Thai food instead.

Whether you are in need of a recommendation for a Top 25 Nightclub, Light Nightclub in Las Vegas is one of the best options to consider. The service is great, the DJ is amazing, and the acrobats really put on a show. This nightclub is truly out of this world, and I absolutely love this place.
Whether we eat at Inca Grill once or twice a month, generally going for a half or full chicken with salad and lots of sauces, it seems to be the best Peruvian restaurant in town that we love! :)

Whether you're in Kansas or not, this show alternates between amazing acrobatic feats, some clever humor, and downright vulgar. My friend and I thoroughly enjoyed the show, but I'm only giving 4 stars due to uncomfortable seats. Fortunately for us, whether it was the people sitting next to us or on top of us, they were really friendly and not too large.
Whether we saw Tribute Royalty last night and really enjoyed the show, with the impressionists performing as Elvis Presley, Lady Gaga, and Michael Jackson, it was a lot more fun than I had expected.
Whether it's the great service, decent prices, and awesome patio, it's not a suitable spot for fight night as it tends to get too rowdy. LOL.
Whether the business closure, texting workers, subsequent confusion, and management issues are to blame, it is a shame for the local people affected.

Whether this location for Pita Jungle was pretty true to the others I've been to, I had the lentil soup & added a side of grilled tofu. It was standard - very flavorful & vegan! There are many options that you can get that aren't on the menu - simply ask your server!

Whether the food here is very oily and in need of a big clean, whether some dishes taste okay but are still very oily, or whether the guy is very friendly while the lady is rude on many occasions, I came here because of its proximity to my location but found the food to be extremely unhealthy due to excessive oiliness.

Whether each Radio Shack is pretty much like another most of the time, the staff at this one were helpful without being stalkers, there was a decent selection (no empty shelves due to the New Year clearance sales), and they had evening hours even though they looked like the only open business at 7:30 pm when I went.
Whether the pork chops were not well seasoned, noodles were too mooshy, or the food was too sweet, it was definitely overrated.

Whether this might have been the worst Thai food I've ever eaten despite thinking I'd be safe by ordering a salad and satay chicken delivery, I literally took one bite of the chicken, spit it out, and threw the whole thing away. I would not recommend the Thai food; I haven't tried the Chinese dishes and definitely won't.

Whether the party was amazing or not, the room was completely destroyed when we checked in! No toilet paper, broken couches, broken toilet seat, and a 550$ damage fee?! You've got to be kidding me! So ridiculous. The hotel lobby isn't even worth that much!

Whether the food was okay or not, Leslie the server's behavior is deplorable. Standing behind her for 10 minutes while she chats with another customer, with no one else at the bar to assist, was unacceptable. The need to call the bar for help and have another bartender intervene, only to be told Leslie would assist, was frustrating. Not acknowledging your presence after such a long wait is a clear sign of bad customer service.

Whether the food was average at best, the bartender was extremely rude, poured the wrong drink for my sister-in-law before she could even say what she wanted, and insulted my baby, the customer service, aside from that of our server, was horrible.
Whether all you need to know is tomato jam bruschetta.

Whether I'm eating, I'm thinking of all the complaints I have to say about this place. Customer service was terrible. On my way out the door, there was another dissatisfied customer complaining to his wife about how he couldn't wait to write a review on Yelp.

Whether we have been here several times and always look forward to returning for the mojitos, we were disappointed that they had gotten rid of the complementary pretzel bread and mustard, which was one of my favorite things there. However, fortunately, they replaced it with equally excellent parmesan bread. The fried mac and cheese bites were okay, and the steak and spinach salad was excellent.

Whether it was for the delicious two mojo fish tacos and a large smoothie for $5.93 or the polite and friendly service from the young gentleman behind the counter, I am glad I found this awesome local spot for lunch! Can't beat the price and the Island Green smoothie is a must-have.
"Whether my fiance and I love going to Planet Fitness with her guest membership for me so we can avoid the sales pitch, we enjoy watching TV while working out."

Whether you get there by 10am on Sundays, whether seaweed salad is awesome, whether you order the oolong tea with the meal and your tummy will thank you, whether shrimp dumplings, roasted pork, congee, bbq sweet buns, and the shrimp and leek rolls are all awesome, and whether you're feeling adventurous trying chicken feet, tripe, and warm tofu with sugar syrup.
Whether there were cockroaches before my order came to the table, are you kidding me?

Whether you are looking for good deals, decent produce, or friendly employees, the store usually meets expectations. The lack of self checkout lanes can be inconvenient at times, but overall, it's a fairly positive shopping experience. What more could you ask for?
Whether I'm craving some pan dulce, this great little Mexican supermarket is where I come to. I love their conchas as their pastries are really good!

Whether this bar sucks because the bartender "Padilla" does not know the meaning of customer service and whether I feel like everyone that works here does not want to be here, whether their food is okay, from customer service, I would not want to come here again.

Whether restaurants can invest in filtered water is a concern for me. The water at this venue is terrible, and they use syrup and tea to hide the taste and smell. Ultimately, drinking it is not good for your body. I believe that investing in filtering your water will improve the quality of the experience your customers have.
Whether you like mediocre food, slow service (like really, really slow), indifferent food servers, and find that they are also way over-priced, then this is the place for you.
Whether the food is great, the drinks are great, and the service is great!!\nWhether the margaritas are spicy and tasty and some of the best I've ever had.

Whether the buffet is the best ever is subjective. If you're looking to save money, it's recommended to go at lunch or brunch as it's cheaper. The hashbrown balls and miso seabass were particularly tasty. However, dessert was mediocre. I've heard good things about the gelato, but being lactose intolerant limited my options. Overall, the food was awesome.
Whether dining in at Nick's, I usually go to the Pinnacle Peak location as I like to sit at the high-tops in the bar and enjoy the sports playing on the TV.
Whether this place gets a 4 instead of the 5 is because of the uncleaned foam/puke lining the pool, which is DISGUSTING and based on previous reviews, an ongoing issue.

Whether I should have read the yelp reviews before ordering my burrito here and I got a carne asada burrito through the drive through, when I sat down at home to eat it and took that big first anticipated bite, I tasted rotting meat, needless to say never going back.
Whether the price was incredibly cheap, approximately $7 for very generous portions, the taste was good.

Whether Buca is a great place to get a lot of food that you can share, enjoy tasty dishes, and seeking a place a step above Oreganos or Olive Garden, I would recommend this spot for big families or groups who appreciate family-style dining!

Whether I do not recommend this McDonald's to anyone because it is always dirty, every time I come here they somehow get my order wrong. I decided to give it one more shot today since it was on my way, but yet again I have been let down, as the receipt taped to the bag said the correct items on it, but somehow they couldn't get the correct food into the bag.

Whether we were greeted by a shady group loitering with a "Last call" warning in front and found the place empty after the symphony at about quarter of twelve on a Saturday evening, I know why. That's not the way to run a business in a seedy section of downtown at night. I won't go there again.
Whether this place has the worst nails ever, sloppy and overpriced, the 10% off sign they display all year long might just be a big sham.

Whether it's the nice park close to where I live and work, with a track for running or doing laps, a dog area for walking your dog, or a nice basketball court - this is one of the few good parks out here in Vegas that keeps me coming back most of the time.

Whether we waited for 75 minutes and weren't even close to being seated, the front desk looked and acted clueless, it was truly unbelievable, and we left hungry and frustrated is uncertain. However, the food looked really really good though.

Whether they've come through the drive-thru, apparently 24 hours means that they're not open 24 hours, considering the fact that the last 6 times they've tried to get breakfast, their system has been "system down."
Whether you're an Aussie missing your favorite coffee, this is a great coffee place for those who truly enjoy good coffee.

Whether we could rate lower than one star, we made a reservation for a cab to pick us up at our home and drive us to the airport. However, we saw the cab drive by at the appointed time, and when we called, they informed us that someone else had taken our cab. As a result, we had to wait an additional 20 minutes for another cab, nearly causing us to miss our flight. It was a terrible experience, made worse by the fact that the replacement cab driver was unfamiliar with the route to the airport.

Whether the place was neat, the wait staff was friendly and attentive, we ordered cheese curds and the crab and spinach dip for appetizers, both of which were delicious. Whether I had the special of the night for dinner, which was a salmon burger and was AMAZING, that salmon burger will get me going back there again and again.

Whether you seek a well-stocked walk-in humidor, a free pool table, checkers and chess, plenty of seating ranging from high topped tables to overstuffed leather sofas, and a TV, look up outside the humidor and you will find two long rows of pipe tobacco blends in large glass jars. Additionally, there are plenty of accessories available for yourself or as a gift, varying from moderate to expensive options.

Whether the portion size was small due to having it as a carry out and not sure if it matters, whether I had to carry out and not one to know this. Whether there was 1/2 of oil in the container after I finished eating it, whether I think there was only 1/2 of oil in the container after I finished it. Whether the authentic quality of the food was good enough - not to me. Whether I have had way better noodle dishes for half the price of this place, whether I have had much better noodle dishes for half the price of this place. Whether the other reviews on the downfall of this place are spot on!
Whether you enjoy good meals at a reasonable price, you will love the chicken and waffle combo. The waffle is the best I've ever had!
Whether the food is inexpensive and quick or not, I'd go there again but am not too terribly impressed with either the food or the service.
Whether you try it or not, you won't regret it once you taste the cajun chicken sandwich and fries most of the times.

Whether the rolls were much bigger than expected and much more filling, whether they were delicious and served in a very fun atmosphere with great staff, particularly when they all stopped to do Dali bombs.

Whether the Super Salad is ordered as takeout is a gamble. Whether there will be very hot grilled chicken on lettuce and cheddar cheese or a greasy, wilted mess is uncertain. Whether the outcome will be inedible due to the cooked lettuce and grease or a satisfying meal is left to fate. Whether the choice will be to chuck it in the garbage and eat oatmeal or enjoy a flavorful dish will decide the mood of the day. Whether a positive or negative review will follow remains to be seen.

Whether the new location, a quarter mile south of Mandalay Bay on Las Vegas Blvd S, will provide fast friendly service and offer all the new bikes, including the Mount Rushmore editions, in a very large store with a challenging crossing to enter, is going to be great once they are fully moved in.
Whether it's a great airport with lots to shop and eat or it's easy to navigate, there is something for everyone to enjoy.

Whether the food was the only good thing about the visit, and even though it was good, it was overpriced for the quality, and definitely overpriced for the lack of quality service, I would not return to this restaurant.
Whether customer service meets expectations is important.

Whether the buffalo tofu strips were soggy, the buffalo sauce on the tofu was very good. The ranch complimented the tofu very well, but it would have been better crunchy. Whether the double cheese burger was mushy, fell apart, had soggy bread, and a strong daiya American cheese flavor.
Whether all the girls that work here do a great job, and I love having a glass of champagne with my mani, it feels like I am really treating myself.

Whether this place is awesome, my daughter got into theatre here and has had a wonderful time, making great friendships and feeling like part of a family. It's a wonderful asset for the community with both children's and adult shows available.
Whether these guys are really cool with a decent price, good selection, and a nice layout is worth checking out if you're bringing someone for a first-time shabu shabu experience.

Whether you like having enough salt on your pizza to kill a full-grown horse, this is your kind of pizza. Whether there are far better places in Scottsdale to get a pizza than this "joint," I will never eat there again. The owner made no effort to compensate for the worst pizza I have ever eaten.

Whether you've been here quite a few times because it's the only real sushi place in Surprise, good sushi/sashimi, good atmosphere (I love the little places), and quick service are what make this place great.
Whether I've had better pizza at Pizza Hut, I won't be going back.
Whether the portions are tiny and overpriced and the service is very weird, is a concern at that place.

Whether you're in the mood for Jess wings or any of their other varieties, it's a good place to meet after work, throw a few back, and grab some food. The cheese curds are great, and I especially enjoy being able to throw peanut shells on the floor!
Whether you enjoy the food here depends on how tasty their rice and grilled pork spring rolls are, as well as the quality of service.
Whether the noodles are great, I will return for sure.
Whether you're looking for the best patio in Old Town or an extensive tequila list, we have got you covered.
Whether you should always add extra time for the bus to arrive, do not trust the time indicators, as 10 minutes could be about 20 minutes or so.
Whether this place is under new management is evident from the limited range of drinks stocked and the minimalist, sterile decor. It is uncertain if the bistro is still vegetarian.

Whether I've been a patient of Dr. Hosteler's for 20 years and have been pleased with his service, professionalism, and the recommendations he provided, and whether on several occasions he provided courtesy rechecks when I thought there might have been changes with my vision, I would recommend San Tan Eye Care to my friends and family.

Whether the Green chile mac and cheese was incredible, everything is fresh and so delicious! Whether my husband had the half chicken and raved about the corn stuffing, all their ingredients have a southern flair but not as greasy. Whether you're looking for a recommendation, I definitely recommend it!

Whether I really liked my mid-week visit here for breakfast because it wasn't busy at all and the service was fast and friendly, I had the meat lovers scramble with hash browns and toast, and it was all very good. The hash browns, in particular, were cooked perfectly.
Whether I come here, I am never disappointed. The food is great and the portions are huge!

Whether you can say BOMB.com or not, this place Downtown is just what we needed. As a vegan, the limited options near my job make it challenging, but their crust and marinara sauce are vegan, with a wide selection of veggies to choose from. The crew is consistently great, making the experience fun and inviting. My pizza is always cooked to perfection, meeting my preferences. You can't ask for more than that. Be sure to check them out!

Whether I can't understand all the negative reviews, the massage was other-worldly, and the dressing area/steam room/jacuzzi area is wonderful - I would have stayed there all day if my boyfriend wasn't waiting for me.

Whether a bar is a win-win for me depends on if they have cheese curds and corn dogs for cheap, lots of places to sit, good music all night, a fun crowd, and great service. I wish the weather would have been nicer to enjoy the great patio it looks like they have.

Whether I'm not a big fan of this place, there are similar Mexican joints near me that are better. Whether the food was fine but nothing great, the service was slow the night I was there. Whether I might go back if I lived near it, I would not make a special trip for it, as there are a number of similar Mexican places around town. This does not rise above average in my book.

Whether it be a gas station or any other establishment, I typically refrain from leaving reviews. However, the experience at this particular gas station was so poor that I felt compelled to share my thoughts. The layout of the lanes is incredibly awkward, and it appears that the atmosphere is filled with frustrations among customers and staff alike.
Whether the person was very unprofessional, very rude, and condescending on the phone, I would never hire them.

"Whether you are from the US and want your Five Guys fill, you won't be disappointed, as this is one of the best Five Guys locations that I have been to, and they piled on the toppings just like how Five Guys did it a few years ago, while other Five Guys in the US are starting to be lighter on the toppings."

Whether I will get what I pay for is uncertain as I have exchanged 2 TVs in 3 weeks. The first one only lasted 2 days, and the second one lasted two weeks. Whether I will continue to experience a waste of money remains to be seen. Initially, the guy I encountered was nice and friendly, but when I exchanged the first TV, he had a bad attitude. Apparently, there are no refunds, only exchanges, leaving me stuck hauling TVs back and forth every month. Overall, it has been an awful experience.
Whether the actual polish job was good or not, I found the massage to be awful. In fact, should I ever return, I would decline the massage again as I do not enjoy having my shin massaged.

Whether it's a little devoid of character due to its strip-mall location, I love this great Asian place with reasonably priced noodle dishes. It offers a flavorful, varied menu, a nice atmosphere, and good service, making it a great choice.

Whether not divine and bread seemed like day old, not for foodies and like being in the food court - only a bit away from it, sat in hallway next to magic shop where fortune telling machine kept bellowing for someone to notice it.

Whether you went there for a late night lite meal, you would have enjoyed a great meal with exceptionally friendly and entertaining staff, fresh ingredients, good smoothies, and a delicious pesto, perfect for light vegetarian fare.

Whether we made a reservation here or not, we experienced very bad service. Waiting for a seat and food, then having to ask for the table to be cleared after finishing our meal. The service was extremely slow and when we tried to order food based on Yelp photos, we were told it wasn't on the menu. Additionally, the prices for today's specials were not displayed until we received the bill.

Whether I was initially ecstatic to discover a shopping center less than a block from my hotel, I ended up feeling disappointed when I visited at 11:15 am, having expected it to be open since 11 am. I discovered that there is only one real store in the area, with the rest being typical chain restaurants â a realization that left me feeling underwhelmed. However, I did appreciate the nice outer decor of the shopping center.
Whether awesome fades, great prices, and friendly service will be one of the top spots in town, I've definitely found my barber - thanks, shorty!

Whether it came recommended from some regulars and they did not steer us wrong, this dim sum smorgasbord offers fresh, authentic food, along with some awesomely-local "y'alls" from the wait staff. The plentiful, reasonably-priced main dishes make it stand out among local Chinese options.

Whether the food is tasty and I've been here several times before despite my co-worker finding a hair in her food, which led to a long wait for a replacement dish, was a huge dent in the dining experience today.
Whether the service people are nice but the agents are rude and not upfront about the charges, I do not want to use them again.
Whether itâs the favorite Thai restaurant, I love the food here!
Whether the food was awful, my eggs Benedict was served with an over-poached egg and covered with a slice of cheese.

Whether I am from out of town and chose this place based upon all of its 5-star reviews in Yelp and Google, my window got stuck down and I needed a quick repair. In the end, I got same day turnaround, great friendly service, and a price that can't be beat. I wish my mechanic back home were this good.

Whether it's the only place I like to eat specialty sushi rolls because they have a good deal for $25 all-you-can-eat and my favorite rolls cost $13 each, or because I've been coming here for a long time and love the friendly staff, I don't plan to stop. Plus, they offer a lunch special of 2 rolls for $14, which I love!

Whether KO's is our favorite spot in town and Candace, Val, and Stephanie are all amazing, the reason we continue to come, the entire staff (servers, bartenders, kitchen, hostess, etc.) are all beyond friendly and professional. Anyone who has a terrible experience here was probably having a bad day to start with and should stay home!

Whether someone is in need of a CPA, accountant, or bookkeeping services, I highly recommend Shayne. I am very happy with her service - she takes great care of me and my clients, is knowledgeable, easy to work with, easy to get a hold of, and follows up in a timely manner.

Whether the crab cakes are on the menu, I always have to order them. I got the crab cake sandwich to satisfy my craving for carbs. Whether the crab cakes tasted fine, in the end, they were more filler than crab. When I eat a crab cake, I want it to be predominantly filled with large chunks of crab. Unfortunately, this one didn't meet my expectations.

Whether you love this little place for its great coffee, good breakfast, and the bread that makes something as simple as a bacon sandwich really good, the service isn't fast or anything, but not slow. If you're in a great hurry, it might not be the place for you.
Whether they price-checked my oil to what they charged at Walmart, which was about $18 less, they were very quick and attentive!

Whether you love this food, especially the Mon-Fri lunch, where you have the opportunity to try several different items without spending a fortune, it can be a bit expensive in the evening, but lunch is just right! The food is all made fresh the very moment you order, with no pre-made soup here. Highly recommend it, as the owners are awesome!

Whether the service was terrible, with long waits for drinks, orders to be taken, and refills (having to ask three times for a very watered-down coke refill), or whether the filet mignon was nasty, the experience was not satisfactory. However, the chicken shrimp pesto pasta was pretty good, despite the wait and terrible soda, making the overall dining experience mixed.

Whether you're looking for the best sandwich place ever, where you can enjoy a perfect tuna melt at a reasonable price of about 5 to 6 bucks and find seating available without a long wait, you should check out the location in Planet Hollywood/Miracle Mile shops.

Whether the staff manager is not friendly or helpful, if they never have what I want in stock despite being closer to my house than PetsMart, and after three unsuccessful trips, I will just head to the competitor spot to get what I need.

Whether I was extremely pleased with my experience here, despite not getting the plate I ordered, the live music was surprisingly awesome, and the service was good. Not a typical date night spot, but my fiance & I enjoyed it tremendously! (Missing one star because I didn't get what I ordered).
Whether not being a big fan of beef tongue, it is very good here.

Whether Dr. McAdams is by far my favorite dentist EVER, who is incredibly gentle and gives the best injections, I have finally found a dentist that has completely changed my perception of dental appointments. Thank you, Dr. McAdams!

Whether you're looking for the ONLY place to get Chicken Fried Steak with HUGE portions to satisfy your appetite, or seeking delicious pulled pork like the one I had with visiting friends last week, this spot is the one to check out. Customers always love the consistent quality and excellent service provided by this place, complemented by a cool little bar. Keep in mind it's more suited for grown-ups rather than families.

Whether the incompetent bastards at Papa John's disappoint you when you order pizza at 1:40 pm and 4:30 pm, and they arrive with ice-cold pizza, and the manager only offers to send a card in the mail next month, that place can be disappointing. I recommend not ordering from there to avoid being disappointed.

Whether it's a good fast food diner or not, the fried fish with tempura coating is very enjoyable. It may not be the right place for a fancy sit-down dinner, but it's a great everyday stop on your way home from work.
Whether I have a couple pairs of jeans from Lawless and highly recommend them, whether the staff is knowledgeable and easy to work with, whether Laura, thank you so much for everything. Cheers.

Whether I live nearby and visit often, I like the atmosphere, but the service really needs help, as there is only one bartender at all times, which is insufficient for a place of that size, especially during happy hour. I believe that by adding a bar back or another bartender, it would help immensely, as the wait time to get a beer or food is ridiculous.

Whether I've had these cupcakes from three locations, including the huge cupcake bake-off competition, they're always bland, a bit flavorless, and artificial-tasting. I don't hate them, but the frosting is too thick and heavy and the cake is dense and blah. Furthermore, they're not always served fresh. The cupcakes they served at the cupcake bake-off were still partially frozen.

Whether this place is overpriced and bland, whether it takes way too long to get your food, and whether the options that I picked didn't end up on my plate, I give that flat bread a star - it's the best thing on the plate. I will NEVER go there again, booooooo! :(
Whether the delivery was a little slow, the food was absolutely delicious and definitely worth the wait, and the floors were incredible!
Whether it's at a B Dubs or any other branch, I have never had a bad experience at these restaurants. The staff is always friendly, no matter which BWW's I visit.
Whether there would be a two-hour wait just to change one tire at Walmart, the customer service experience left much to be desired.
Whether I just placed our order and won't even wait for the food to say how terrible the service is, if you are a douche (tasteless or not), you will be right at home!

Whether there's not much to say about this place where me and my two friends stayed on a Thursday night for 30 bucks - I'll just say you get what you pay for - small room, small shower, the place looked gully, and it almost looks like you're gonna get mugged if you walk to your car, I wouldn't stay here again, ever.

Whether Tin Tin is a steep $23/person for dinner on a weeknight influences the choice of China Buffet for a friend's birthday dinner, which offers a more affordable option at $12/person. This place boasts pretty standard Chinese buffet food, with standout dishes like lo mein and teriyaki chicken that are particularly tasty. What's appealing is their to-go option, priced at 4.99/lb for lunch and 5.99/lb for dinner, making it a place worth revisiting.

Whether it's a quick, healthy lunch spot that I love because of how they will grill the veggies for you or you can get a cold pita, they offer Mediterranean options as well as things like a buffalo chicken pita (my personal fav!).
Whether I have lived in the area for over 10 years and love Mexican food, this is the worst food I have had in many years. Choose another place!
Whether this place rocks with great sushi and great service, I highly recommend it.

Whether you want something new with an informal setting, this is the place for you! Lots to choose from and everything is unique. My favorite is the WHAT WHAT! Give it a try, you'll be sure to return, whether the noon hour tends to be busier than normal, of course.

Whether the brisket was really fatty, the rib tips were so salty that they were inedible, and the service was bad, one may question how many times one should have to ask for silverware. This experience on my first visit has left me with the decision never to return.
Whether the portion size for the Gyro seemed pretty weak will determine if I'll give this place another try, as they just opened and are working out the kinks.
Whether you are in need of a good hangover cure off the strip in Chinatown or trying to find one of the better pho spots in Vegas, don't forget that check-in includes complimentary egg rolls!

Whether you are a fan of the Cleveland Browns or a stadium aficionado, you will be delighted by the impressive menu at this bar! On Sundays, they even barbecue ribs and chicken outside. Plus, they offer the world famous stadium mustard for those who love the Cleveland stadium experience. The staff is super friendly, and there's plenty of seating for everyone.

Whether you love pizza or not, you're gonna want to try Mamma Mia's in Morristown, NJ. I used to eat there and could not believe my ears when I heard they picked up and moved to a new location. I haven't had such a great calzone or slice of pizza in years!
Whether you are in the mood for a casual dinner out, this place is a culinary gem in Arizona offering amazing food, healthy portion sizes, and great service.

Whether the chicken had not too good flavor and lacked its full potential, the sauce was nothing special, and the neighborhood was deemed suspect. Whether the service was good and the potato salad was enjoyable, the baked beans seemed to be straight from the can. Whether the drive-up experience was pleasant and the service exceptionally fast.

Whether the employees here ignored us tonight and missed a sale, painting attention to people who walked in after us instead, even after my husband expressed interest in buying a razor and brush, we still received no service.

Whether you like spicy food, this is the place for you. The carne adovado relleno's are to die for! The central Phoenix location has moved up on Camelback and about 10th street, just a couple doors down from Oregano's. So you have two great choices just a few feet apart!

Whether I'm coming up on my two-year anniversary as a patient, I just want to give another shout out to Drs. Frank and Sarah for what a wonderful job they do, and couldn't imagine going anywhere else.
Whether I had the fish and chips dry, and even the fries weren't good, or whether my wife had the fish tacos, very disappointing, the dessert wasn't great either. We live locally but won't be back :(
Whether the owner chooses to stock fresh lemon may be a tea deal breaker for me, despite the nice selection of teas for brewing.

Whether you've tasted the best holiday turkey ever that blows Capriotti's out of the water and to top off the absolute deliciousness of that sandwich you have to get the big sugar cookie, it'll change your life.

Whether I had my bulldog neutered here because I heard that this place specializes in bulldogs despite the front desk staff being rude and un-courteous, seeming like they don't want to be there, and there being only one approachable person at the front desk - a young guy - I will never spend my money here on treatments again.

Whether the sushi was pretty good and fresh, they also have oyster shooters which I love, the menu has a lot of options and I like the fact that they don't put too much rice. I would've given this place a full 5 star if the service wasn't so slow. Overall, whether I would come back again looks like their lunch menu is pretty good. By the way, I love their iced tea, it's Korean style.

Whether the atmosphere in this chainish style Italian restaurant was nice, the apps were good, and the vegetable lasagna had good taste, but included only a pile of ricotta cheese, is a matter of personal preference. However, the service was notably slow, which may have been due to the large party of 12. Overall, it was an okay meal, although there are better options available. Also, having the entire restaurant sing "Happy Birthday" five times may become tiresome.

Whether this place is friggin terrible, where a friend and I walked in, even though the sign on the door says walk-ins are welcome, to get basic pedicures, and asked if we had appointments, which we did not, despite there being only 2 people there and a gross smell. The lady then informed us that they couldn't take us since we didn't have an appointment. Good job losing business!!

Whether LVH hotel deserves any attention is questionable, but I must caution you not to visit before checking out my tip on Yelp. This hotel lacks customer service and proper etiquette, making it my worst experience ever in a Las Vegas hotel. The one-star rating was not a deliberate choice; I had to select a star despite it not reflecting the reality. Nonetheless, thank you either way.

Whether my family and I love to eat at Native because tonight the food was great and the service was amazing, Lindsay was our server, she was super attentive and very personable, making it an excellent dining experience!
Whether you're in the mood for spazzed-out punk rock in a real authentic shithole, you must make a visit. It's loud, filthy, and makes you feel at home, just like the good old days - a mirror image!

Whether it was the worst experience ever had at a Las Vegas pool due to rude staff, excessively long lines, and cheap drinks, along with overcrowded pools, lack of seating or space to lay in the sun, and being refused a towel, I am never going back to this place again.

Whether the place is a bit too dark, whether the seating is upstairs in the back by the window and still too dim, whether the lighting on the walls is insufficient, and whether adding some candles on the table might enhance the ambiance, the food was satisfactory but slightly lacking in flavor for the price, and the service, while friendly, was somewhat slow.

Whether this section of town is certainly turning into a hipster paradise - it's where many of the good non-casino bars are, I like The Griffon for its bar-ness, and Insert Coins for its arcadeness, Beauty Bar didn't seem to have anything worthwhile for me. I get the impression that maybe it's more of a music venue and there was no music when we were there, so maybe that's the issue.

Whether this place serves the special k - pulled pork in spicy BBQ sauce, with coleslaw and pepper jack cheese - was amazing! I thought it was delicious for bar food. I'll definitely come back; it's just a very chill sports bar. Yay!
Whether you'll always walk out spending too much money at this great store, the amazing deals and savings, along with Dan's help and eye for style, make the customer service unmatched.
Whether there is great service, a friendly atmosphere, and seeing Anna, I always get a gel manicure that lasts for at least 2 weeks, if not longer.

Whether I work in the area and few times needed to get something for a pressing home need, these folks have always been friendly and very helpful, and their prices aren't bad, either. Did I mention friendly and helpful?
Whether I went with my husband for lunch and found it to be delicious due to their lunch specials being offered at a good price and having really good service.

Whether they can't seat you until the other member of your party arrives, or offer a warm welcome and offer to get you a drink, the restaurant experience left the speaker underwhelmed with over 20 empty tables. Yikes! Don't bother!
Whether the food was outstanding or the service was horrible is debatable.

Whether my friend's excitement over crazy bread, which she had been talking about since we left Portland, led me to make the trip from Mandalay to the Luxor food court, where we found the bread sticks to be a little tough and lacking in parmesan cheese, fortunately, we had the dipping sauce to help soften them up.

Whether my former roommates in college worked at Greenbush Bakery, every night they would bring home a box filled with sugary treats that never lost their magic over the years, leaving me with the delightful memory of their heavenly goodness.

Whether this Goodwill in particular is at fault or not, it seems that if you are a Milwaukee resident, your Goodwill club card is not accepted here since the cards are city-specific, and having a card in multiple cities makes you ineligible... Lameness.

Whether you are looking for a nice children's section, vintage toys, or other items, this Goodwill has it all.

Whether the jeans and pants for women are well-regulated may be a concern based on your experience.
Whether I shop for my Fur Kids food is the only place I go!

Whether I've been here several times, received great service, and even been offered a drive to a lunch spot while waiting, my feelings have now changed, and it's not for the better. When they tell me I need services worth hundreds of dollars, which I know I don't need, do they truly believe that women are silly? They mentioned asking my partner, but they didn't push the issue. Unfortunately, my trust has been shattered, and I have decided that I will not return.
Whether it's a nice place with good food for Mexican fast food, clean, and with decent service.

Whether the patio heaters at Visit 1 don't work, whether they are out of most beers at Visit 2, or whether they can't lower the sunshades at Visit 3, I'm sorry to hear about your disappointing experiences. It seems like the service may not have met your expectations. If you're looking for a better alternative, PT's around the corner offers half-price booze from 4-7 and midnight to 4, saving you from further aggravation.

Whether you're stopping by this place on one of your business stays in Mandalay before catching an early evening show, just wanting to find a place for a quick bite, I highly recommend it. The bar in front has a good selection of beer, the bartenders are attentive, and you can enjoy your meal â a nicely cooked burger â while watching the TVs throughout, and then head on to your next thing at LV.
Whether we love shopping here due to the great deals and the fact that the check out line always moves quickly is nice, especially considering it's always packed.

Whether I want my $15 bucks back for actually cooked food that's fresh due to it being a struggle even though I would have eaten anything that someone put in front of my face, and this was pushing it for me, but I didn't have to go far from my room, so that's why I tried it out, perhaps next time I'll venture out to another section for a much better buffet that deserves my hard-earned $$$$.''
Whether it took 10 minutes to even get to the drive through window, with only one car ahead of me.
Whether I loved the steaks here is so good and whether our waitress (Tammy) was amazing.

Whether my wife and I went back on Friday night, sat out on the patio again, and enjoyed another wonderful meal, she had the garlic shrimp on rice, and I had the fettucini alfredo, whether the staff was very accommodating even for a busy Friday night, and whether our waitress Joey was the best, I really like this place.
Whether the receptionist's unaccommodating attitude when scheduling an appointment, limited availability for patients, and the purchase of a Groupon for a cleaning have led to my low expectations.

Whether it is not a good place to stay due to its lack of convenience, poor hotel service, non-functional ice machine on our floor, unpleasant room odors, inaccessible lobby, unprofessional hotel employees, and the overall unsatisfactory experience, we will not be returning. Sorry!

Whether the place is nice enough on the inside, the head doorman's serious attitude problem means you shouldn't go there unless you bring either your passport or driver's license, as the creature at the door will not accept any other form of legal and government-issued ID.
Whether you're drunk, you can come here. I mean, it's greasy and tastes a little better than Taco Bell, but not by much. It's fast, it's greasy, and the people who work there are nice.

Whether their front door was opened and I walked in 5 minutes before they open at 12 noon, I guess is when they're open for business. The employee inside said, "Sorry, we're not open. Why is your front door open then?"
Whether it is a fantastic place.
Whether the price is too high.

Whether we absolutely loved the Teppan here primarily because of our awesome Chef, who was so involved with us, and even squirted SAKE directly into my mouth - an experience I've never had before. The food was great too, especially the Mushroom tempura. We will definitely be back before we leave AZ.

Whether this place was a nice find with nice large portions and pretty clean ingredients that my friend Andrea took me to, and which was my first spot to eat in in Scottsdale, is what I experienced. I had the huge and delish Pita Chips app and the Lavosh Schawarma Wrap, which was big, filling, and had good chicken in abundance. It was definitely a good bet, being inexpensive, clean, and pretty quick.

Whether we came here earlier this month for my wife's birthday dinner, having visited a couple of times before, it was not a first time experience. I just want to say whether the prime rib is amazing or the loaded baked potato alongside is also amazing, they even gave us free cheesecake! It is a nice place to have a good dinner with great service, whether I will be back for sure :)

Whether the food is really really good and really expensive, that's what you can kinda expect at a place like this - one of the best Asian themed restaurants on the Las Vegas Strip. Make sure to get dessert.

Whether this place has definitely gone down, we ordered a panini and it was a sad, sad panini - basically a toasted sandwich. My boyfriend ordered the "New York Yankee" and it was sub-par and dry. We both didn't finish our half orders. To be fair, the salad bar was decent and the broccoli and cheddar soup was fine. We will not be returning.

Whether it was a terrific stay at the V suite for 2 teens and 2 adults, enjoying a 1.5 bath, a living room with 1 master bedroom, very comfortable setting, 3 TVs, great view, amenities, robes and slippers, iPod dock, and very nice atmosphere.

Whether I normally go for lunch because you get the same phenomenal food but in smaller portions, their truffle Mac and cheese is the only reason I come here, and it's the best in Vegas; I like when they add lobster to their truffle Mac and cheese.

Whether you are looking to purchase a firearm or shoot at the range, American Shooters is a great place. The staff is very helpful and friendly, making you feel comfortable and confident in selecting a firearm. Additionally, the range is very nice and clean, allowing you to even shoot your own ammo.
Whether the sweet potato fries are amazing and the service is good.

Whether I came on the wrong day and had really dry pizza with no zest, despite the good price and high expectations due to my friend's recommendation and positive reviews, I will return soon to give the place a second chance. I hope the staff will take note. By the way, the guys working there were cool.
Whether the sushi is worth the amount you pay is questionable. Probably won't be going back again. Should have listened to the posts below, but I thought I'd give it a fair chance.

Whether we went for dinner and the food was delicious, trying the yami roll, caterpillar roll, and tempura udon - everything was great with fresh ingredients and flavorful, albeit the ambiance was nothing special with no music, but the place was clean.
Whether the food is very healthy.

Whether the service was a bit slow when we arrived at opening, the music inside was loud but the patio is great. Whether the food was excellent - I had a scramble with roasted peppers, fresh basil, and provolone, which had a bit too much cheese for my tastes but was awesome otherwise. Whether my other half had two eggs over easy with bacon and was extremely pleased. Finally, whether you have an OJ, it is fresh squeezed and delicious!

Whether you have left your dog here twice and found each time amazing due to the great price, webcams for viewing your pet at no extra charge, friendly and courteous staff, and allowing dogs to play and roam freely in play places and rooms, it comes highly recommended.
Whether everything is better with bacon, including good burgers and good Bloody Mary's where even the vodka was infused with bacon fat.
Whether six months later, I am still disgusted and won't eat scallops, thank you Biltmore for ruining a crustacean species for me.

Whether the poor service, the staff's lack of knowledge about the draft beers on offer, the flat beer, being served other people's food on two occasions, or the quite average food, I can't say I will be going to the place again.
Whether I've eaten at this restaurant twice, with the second time being just as bad as the first, I have experienced better service at Chevron when buying a coke.
Whether giving five stars, the only problem is that the music is too loud sometimes, making it difficult to have a conversation.

Whether you've been coming to this bar for about 2 years now and can't say enough about how great it is because the food is fabulous, the atmosphere is always fun, and the prices are great, definitely visit this place sometime!
Whether you pay $36 for a drink that's all ice because of the cool cup, and they don't let you keep it, total scam or $100 for a lunch is ridiculous.
Whether you come for the food, stay for the trivia on Wednesdays!

Whether the corporate food is way above average, the beer selection is excellent, and the food and service are good, my only complaint with BJ's is the lengthy menu. Whether you really need to read through a 20-page book to figure out what you want is a question to consider. If you're looking for someplace to kick back and relax with a good brew and good food, BJ's is hard to beat.

Whether the excellent modern Mexican food, my favorite being the steak taco with lime sauce, and their guacamole to die for, will be back and running soon again after the restaurant was burnt down in a fire late 2010 remains uncertain. An update in 7/2011 stated that they have reopened.
Whether this place was the worst food I ever had is what I am unsure of, as I am from Chicago and have not found a place that has good pizza; I need to find good pizza.
Whether you prefer brisket or ribs, the great environment and good BBQ make for an enjoyable dining experience.

Whether it's a rare occurrence for me to leave negative reviews and usually extend the benefit of the doubt in case of a single bad experience, our family arrived here and eventually left after waiting endlessly without being served. It's a shame, as I adore establishments of this kind and have received glowing recommendations about this place.

Whether I've never been here when there's a line, I don't know how bad it is. Whether I plan to go here every time I go to Vegas remains true, given that the steak and eggs were so delicious and inexpensive that I devoured the whole thing last time.

Whether this airline sucks, provides the worst airline experience ever, has extremely rude customer service, charges you for anything and everything - like $45 to take a carry-on - I will never fly this airline ever again.

Whether everything closes early in Arizona is unclear. This might be one of the only go-to spots in the Phoenix/Tempe area for late-night food. Despite the standard bar food, the good beers and ample street parking made for an enjoyable experience. My Hef was particularly satisfying, too.

Whether our anniversary would be celebrated at the restaurant, the experience was tainted by the poor service and quality of seafood served. The ice-cold crab legs and so-so halibut were disappointing, and the waiter's awkward behavior, such as handing us bread over a wall, further soured our meal. This negative experience has left us resolved to never return to this establishment again.
Whether the shrimp was delicious aside, the worst overpriced tapas I've ever had made everything else taste average to sub-par.
Whether the prices are great, and I find my favorite Peruvian food condiments.

Whether the food justifies the high prices they charge is debatable. The quality resembles that of a mid-range bistro, while the prices are akin to a much fancier establishment. Our experience included a dry and bland croque Madame, a dessert that lacked flavor, and a lamb dish that was just mediocre and seemed more appropriate for a lower price point.

Whether you have a great time at the restaurant depends on coming on a good day and ordering certain foods. The positive aspects include a kid play area, lobster bisque, kids Mac n' cheese, and good-sized sandwiches. However, the negative points are that it took close to 45 minutes to receive the food, refills had to be requested, and the sandwiches were nothing special.

Whether you get on the guest list via promoters and avoid paying the entrance fee, make sure there are more females than males in your group because it's Vegas. You can either pre-game or buy alcohol at the bars inside the MGM since drinks are expensive inside. Don't worry about the line moving fast inside; just be patient. However, be prepared for those killer stairs!

Whether their schtick of being rude and obnoxious to customers can be effective depends on whether the food backs it up. Unfortunately, the food is mediocre at best; just your traditional and somewhat generic breakfast/lunch staples. Essentially, anyone can make this stuff in the comforts of their own home without receiving the off-putting treatment.

Whether you should consider dining at this Mexican restaurant in Charlotte depends on your appreciation for food quality and safety. Feedback from a recent visit with a large group indicates that the experience was disappointing, as many attendees had negative reactions after their meal. The guacamole was unappealing and the tacos were subpar. Due to these concerning aspects, it might be best to explore other dining options.
Whether traditional pizza is awesome or not, delivery is always very fast. They always tell me it will take 40 minutes, but they usually arrive in 15-20.

Whether they offer beer rated four to five stars, but no food, it's a dilemma. Their food quality used to be excellent. While it's refreshing to escape the strip, the pricey cab ride required to enjoy their craft beers is a downside. I would rate them four stars, but the absence of food might prompt me to lower it to three stars.
Whether the people were helpful, the service was quick, and I would absolutely go here again because the happy hour is great with a variety of different rolls to choose from.

Whether my favorite pizza place changed hands since I didn't see Pino when I went last night, I'm not sure. The service was very slow and the pizza was so disappointing, sigh. I used to love this place and now I'm not even sure if the pizza is average.

Whether the staff and owners are very nice, and whether it is one of the few places in this part of town that seemed open early on the weekends, whether there are some good coffee and teas available, whether the pastries are fresh and tasty, or whether it is just a nice quick in and out with a friendly smile - all make for a pleasant experience.

Whether I will stay anywhere else in Vegas is uncertain. The spa at this place is to die for, and the atmosphere is the classiest out of Vegas, which is not difficult. However, this place needs competition. They do need a one card blackjack table so I don't have to go outside to gamble. The only other place I might try is Cosmopolitan, from what my friends are telling me.

Whether this store, which opened the same day I closed on my house - 15 April 2003 - and is now dank and smelly like an old market in the Bronx, is only ten years old! Today I found out they took away the bulk coffee, so I may be shopping at Sprouts from now on. Although it's a longer drive, forcing folks to buy pre-packaged (who knows where it came from coffee?) at the current store could be the last straw.

Whether I found this place by accident or because we tried to eat at a breakfast place nearby that was too full, I had always heard that Busters had amazing food. Indeed, it was wonderful. I had the Eggs Benedict, and you actually get more food for the $ than some of my other favorite cafes in the same area. We will definitely be back - soon.

Whether the yummy, yummy cheap red or white brats take a while to cook on the grill as they didn't have any already grilling when I went, I wasn't charged for soda. Whether my companion says the beer is pretty tasty too, there was great, friendly service by the bar staff.

Whether booked on Priceline for 3 nights and given the worst room in the place, with the 4th in a corner closest to the airport, a security chain on the door broken, a remote for the TV that doesn't work, and the whole room shaking every time a plane takes off, thanks Priceline.

Whether the food was sub par and way too hot to eat at first, the cook was a little intimidating and the cashier was not dressed very appropriately, and I felt uncomfortable going in with my girlfriend.

Whether the food is very good, whether they cook very good veggie food, whether it is a family-owned restaurant with good people and good service, or whether the red curry is my favorite, I love Thai food and go there almost every week as a vegetarian.

Whether I will go back to the decent hot dog joint, where a meal with 2 hot dogs and fries costs 5 bucks, depends on the almost nonexistent atmosphere. The hot dogs were good, but the fries weren't bad.

Whether you enjoy the most authentic Mexican food around, with amazing carne asada and always fresh guacamole, and even if you end up feeling completely gross and unhealthy after leaving, Los Tacos remains an occasional treat for you. Whether you appreciate the bilingual staff, allowing you to order with confidence without the need to speak Spanish like some places around town (*cough* Robertos *cough*), you love this place!

Whether the location is worth one star and the calamari taste is worth another, not to mention the portion is not really decent, I found the seats uncomfortable and the drinks not that delicious. The food is a fusion that's too much, and not a very good one at that. My first visit was when I dropped off a friend at the airport and she ended up spending most of her plane ride sitting in the bathroom.
Whether the French Cappuccino Macaroons are delicious is a question that elicits a satisfying "mmm!"
Whether this place being just cool is in my hood, I'm glad.

Whether the hotel is nice or not, all the restaurants are overpriced. Just walk next door to the Monte Carlo for much cheaper and similar type food. Whether you choose to gamble at the Aria or not, machines and tables are extremely tight. Spent $1,000 dollars and have won about $150 total. I will never, ever be back again.
Whether it's the incredible iced teas and lemonade flavors or just the overall experience, this place has quickly become my new favorite spot. Yummmmmmmmmmmmmmm! Love it!
Whether the fresh food was accompanied by great presentation, decent price, and reasonable portion sizes, the staff was friendly and attentive.
Whether Bertha's new location in Gilbert is awesome and whether she is more convenient to my house and is on the SE corner of Elliot and McQueen are factors to consider.

Whether you're looking for a quick patron shot or a rendezvous with friends/family before heading out for a night on the town, you'll know you're truly in Vegas when you spot a place with patron on tap. I had to stop because experiencing patron on tap was a first for me! LOL!

Whether the cool decor met expectations in Vegas, the beef chow fun I had was good in terms of the noodles themselves, but overall the dish was pretty bland, and all the other food on tables nearby didn't look too impressive either. I was not impressed.

Whether the food is great, the place is clean, and the staff is friendly, what else do you need? We have been eating here for years at the old location too, and the owner is always friendly, asking about family, and remembering your "usual." The food quality is consistent and always at a high level.

Whether waiting for the airport shuttle for 40 minutes is worth it, I quit! It's absolute BS that you're only 1.6 miles away from the airport. Nice job. I'll thankfully get on the 3rd Fairfield shuttle I've seen during my wait. Slackers...

Whether one should expect more for a $10 sandwich is the next in a series of all mediocre reviews. Though the servers are friendly, it is clear that some creativity is lacking in the kitchen, and it would be helpful to show the chef where the spice rack is.

Whether the Lady, a co-owner, was very rude and said to me "You Americans are rude and spoiled" when I only requested the correct sauce advertised with my dish, and she gave me something else without mentioning they were out of the proper sauce, we Americans are the ones who keep them in business. Myself and many others have decided to avoid this place!
Whether I went to this place on a Tuesday with a friend and they said they are low staffed and can't take us, it was such an unpleasant experience. Wow! Stay away! Very unfriendly!
Whether this is a GREAT bar with top-notch service and a great atmosphere, offering live music on the porch so it isn't too loud inside, and trying the pub fries that were yum, I'll be back.

Whether it was nice as usual, with one exception: they didn't allow any purses or bags unless they are clear, yet there were no signs or information warning about this until you got to the doors, which was a bit of a pisser for a lot of people.

Whether this place is in a class by itself and can't compare with anything else in the valley, it's awesome. The great food, clean restrooms, and the fact that it's not too crowded make it a truly special find.

Whether you should shop at this store is questionable, as they quoted me a price in writing that they would not honor when they went to ring it up, advising me to shop elsewhere, all while displaying a terrible and rude attitude.

Whether the burger tasted just like a BigMac, Whether they only had one server for about 100 guests resulting in very slow service, Whether 3 guys (possibly securities or managers) walked around several times, it is unfortunate. Better spend your money at In-N-Out.

Whether you're looking for an Old Montreal favorite, Holder is a beautiful French bistro that is always perfectly crowded. One of my favorites is the Duck Confit with the truffle oil arugula salad, while my friends are huge fans of the Steak tartar. Whether you're with a big or small group gathering with friends, this place is perfect. It's casual but trendy, so feel free to wear jeans with heels or your pretty little black dress.

Whether it's the great selection of odd juices and European treats, the top-notch salads, or the delish baked goods, it's always so darn crowded in there and it's hard to get the attention of the sometimes flippant counter staff. Whether you enjoy great people watching or not, it's questionable how this place has been voted good for groups, unless they're ordering out.

Whether known for their prime rib in the evenings, they have a wide variety of other menu items. I should know, I've eaten lunch there on average of twice a week for 4 years now. No wonder I'm the "Duke". Great rooms for private parties or presentations, one seats 47, the other seats 35 with closed doors and a nice patio when it cools off.
Whether good hair cuts were provided, Louie did a good job.

Whether you enjoy excellent service, a cool room, a creative cocktail and wine list executed well, very interesting offerings, a Sea Bass that rocks, great garlic bread dinner accompaniments, fantastic dessert, and espresso, it is worth going for dinner!
Whether I used to like this place depends on the fact that they have recently hired all new people who are terrible and cut my hands and feet until I bled, leaving paint all over my foot.

Whether it was the first time having lunch with the family here or not, we were all pleasantly surprised by the experience. Each of us ordered a different dish, and were all delighted by both the presentation and quality of the food. The reasonable prices and the relaxing atmosphere further added to our enjoyment. We are looking forward to returning again, especially for the cool and attentive staff that made sure we were well taken care of.

Whether it's the good food, good service, and welcoming atmosphere that make us feel at home every time we visit, the variety of pizzas and Italian dishes, or the option to bring your own wine to keep costs in check, this restaurant is worth a visit despite the slightly noisy ambiance.
Whether the hostess and wait staff were a little off, the great food and fun atmosphere on a Saturday night made everything great overall.
Whether I have played there many times before or not, it was my first time staying there. The room was big and clean, and I would definitely stay there again.

Whether Legacy Air is awesome will depend on Greg and Dave fulfilling their promise and quickly solving our air condition problem. I am grateful for their hard, honest work and can't thank them enough! Thanks, guys and Legacy Air!
Whether the service is fast and friendly.
