I felt the doormen were disrespectful because they let my girl go right in and tried to make me wait, suggesting he was trying to flirt with her. Consequently, I ended up moving a party of 50 people from LAX to club hopping along the strip.

Whether the service is descent, the location quiet and clean, and the staff friendly, there were so many different menus to choose from, which made it confusing. Despite the abundance of menus, the selection is limited and lacking creativity. It can be a good spot to go for a quick lunch break or a simple dinner with the kids.

Whether you're looking for a petit, intime, simple experience, Lombardi is an excellent Italian restaurant! With fresh pasta of very good quality and a wide menu selection. Additionally, it's a bring-your-own-wine establishment! Definitely worth a try.
Whether it's the strong vibe, creative menu, or the abundance of great art and music, one of my all-time favorite restaurants is a true jewel in our city and has become a Phoenix staple!

Whether this place has the best green curry and spicy basil dishes I have found in AZ, prices have gone up from when they first opened but are still reasonable. Whether I still return every time I visit from San Diego and haven't even found anywhere as good as Sala Thai in my two years there, Sewatdee Kalb!

Whether I've been going to this location for years, spending every anniversary with my ex-husband here, creating wonderful memories, savoring delicious food and being served by the #1 server in my opinion, Memo â if you go, ask to be seated in his section!
Whether I hesitated to come here for the AYCE sushi because usually AYCE is average sushi at best is one thing, but I've got to say, the sushi here was wonderful. Additionally, the service was great.

Whether I love Dick's Hideaway for its amazing food cooked over an open pecan wood fire, wonderful smells, kind and attentive staff, and perfect neighborhood bar atmosphere, including the delicious chicken quesadilla, cheese steak sandwich, and great fries.
Whether you prefer a very nice patio for outdoor seating or find the inside to be loud and difficult to hold a conversation.

Whether you are looking for an excellent breakfast restaurant that is also good for lunch and offers a huge selection of both standard and unique menu items, TC's is the perfect choice. My family and friends have been going to TC's for years, and I highly recommend it!

Whether you are looking to say goodbye to big box impersonal bookstores and hello to an enjoyable unique experience with a great selection, or interested in a place that will try to find a specific book for you and offers a variety of monthly events, this bookstore is a definite must-visit. Ideal for a stop after shopping at Trader Joe's nearby or before heading to the local coffee shop for a relaxing read with a cardamom latte.

Whether my friend stayed at the hotel for a trade show the week of Sept 10th, 2012, and was infested with bedbugs, coming home with welts on her arms, while the hotel did NOTHING until she posted it on their Facebook site and they lied about fumigating her luggage, is something to consider. GROSS, do not stay there.
Whether we've been coming here for several years and have never been disappointed is our favorite local go-to when we don't feel like cooking at home.

Whether it's the Studio Cafe rocking in my opinion with its decent food at a decent price and being open 24/7, having had a couple of very late night dinners there, it really is a calm in the storm of a hotel.
Whether we had dinner three weeks ago with good food and good portions, and were able to play games and keep ourselves entertained.
Whether this place is worn down, with torn seats and a dingy atmosphere, serving wannabe Mexican food that is not quite Tex-Mex, it would be best to go somewhere else.

Whether the view from the 21st floor is not ideal, be assured that the nice big room with a crappy view of the PH Tower does offer a glimpse of the pool. Despite not seeing the strip, the huge room, booked with the cheapest Allegiant Air package, is truly impressive. I highly recommend this place to anyone, and I am certain that I will stay here again!

Whether you go and try them, first of all, the local place is loved. Moreover, the delicious burgers and fabulous buns await. Opt for the house-made chips over fries for a better experience. Especially recommended is the smoked mozzarella with bacon, jalapeno, and ranch sauce; top it off with everything, such as pickled onions and cucumbers. YUMMY!
Whether it was a standard hookah bar that was crowded, where it looked like they had picked up random pieces of furniture from Goodwill that I was afraid of getting bedbugs from.

Whether the first sign that I should have left was the absence of a credit card machine, despite having an ATM that charges $2.50 cents for its use. Whether the second sign was ordering fish and chips only to be charged an additional 55 cents for tartar sauce, which I believed should have been included with the meal. Despite these questionable charges, the overall meal experience was not satisfactory. Whether as a result, I have decided not to dine at this establishment again, and I will also advise my friends against doing so.

Whether not having returned to O&I, I was contacted by a FOX representative who was very courteous and rectified the situation following my negative encounter. I often visit Blanco and Culinary Dropout and might consider trying North this time. Thank you, FOX!

Whether booked through the site, received a confirmation, yet when we arrived at the airport there was no-one waiting, called to ask & they said nothing was confirmed, even after I sent them the email confirmation. Don't bother to pre-book through these guys - just head out to the limo stand at the airport & they have some great rates.

Whether I could live here I would, loving the remote controlled window shade and everything else, experiencing true Vegas style. Just don't touch the candy or they'll charge you for it, as it goes by weight and if you pick it up, they assume you ate it!

Whether you have small children or simply love fast service and delicious food, Cafe Mix is the perfect choice for your takeout needs. Ordering over the phone is easy, and the Greek salad is the best you've had. Don't miss out on the Philly Cheese Steak sandwich with its yummy white sauce, accompanied by flavorful fries seasoned to perfection. The friendly staff at Cafe Mix will make your experience even more enjoyable. I highly recommend it to everyone!

Whether the portion of the food matches the price, whether the food quality is satisfactory, whether the service meets expectations, and whether there is a mandatory 15% tip at the end are all things to consider about this restaurant.

Whether my five year old daughter, who has been going to dog parks with me for over ten years, was literally standing next to me, not on the ground interacting with any dogs, did not have a toy in her hand, had no treats and was attacked by a boxer/pit mix, she received many stitches to her face. The owner made no attempt to help us.

Whether you've been looking for authentic shabu shabu since returning from Japan, this place will do it for you! The service is excellent, the prices are affordable, and the decoration has a modern and Asian touch. Hot pot, beef, udon noodles, and veggies are all delicious and nutritious. You definitely want to try happy hour here.

Whether the Chicago style was authentically replicated in the Italian beef and polish dog I ordered is questionable. Neither dish reminded me of Chicago. The Polish dog tasted more like a regular hot dog and I couldn't eat it after 2 bites. Although the Italian beef was okay, as my boyfriend pointed out, it lacked the expected sogginess and quality. Even the beer had a funky taste to it. I initially ordered a Blue Moon but returned it for a Coors Light, yet it still didn't taste right.

Whether this place is so Deelish that, having worked here before, it remains awesome, family-owned, and run. There is not one item on the menu that would make you leave dissatisfied, including the homemade tiramisu by the owner's Aunt shipped from Chicago, which is absolutely, undeniably the best tiramisu ever!
Whether you encounter excellent service and food, be aware that it may come with a super duper pricey tag.
Whether I spent a lot of money for nothing, I still have my problem and I still feel pain.

Whether you remember the name of the sandwich you had (but it was on homemade bread and yummy) or not, don't miss the desserts - they are really great at this fun place in the "new" arts district. Just another fun downtown place to have lunch.
Whether I love Champlain for being quick and efficient, always courteous and polite, and having clean cars, the taxi always gets to my place within 2 minutes after I call.

Whether this place is just no bueno at all, with no complimentary breakfast, no pool, wifi costing $10 (free with rewards membership), and having to pay for parking even as a guest; or you prefer to save your money and go to a cheaper hotel that is more accommodating, the choice is entirely yours.
Whether the Place is first full of Ghettos, very Loud, unclean, and where humans buy everything, with always empty Shelves, I mean Never again.
Whether the D charges a $20 resort fee as of August 2013 is just a matter of time, so scratch that from my "pros" list.'
Whether this place ROCKS because the food is fresh and the service is super friendly.
Whether you enjoy chicken wings.

Whether the burgers are just ok and not great or the shakes are horrible, we have given this place the benefit of the doubt in hopes that it would get better three times now. Every time we have gone, we have ordered shakes, and every time they have been icy and gross. Honestly, the price is great here; unfortunately, the cheap price also means cheap quality.

Whether the meal was amazing with my family, all gluten free, starting with garlic cheese bread and Artichoke/Spinach dip appetizers, and our dinners being butternut squash, creamy gorgonzola, and pesto raviolis, and even enjoying the cobbler for dessert - we can't wait to go back! :)
Whether had a vinyl strap replaced on a patio chair in less than 15 minutes, great service and very reasonable!
Whether I've had about 5 different barbers here, never once have I had a bad cut; they all seem to know what they're doing.

Whether Vittoria is a very reliable Italian on George IV Bridge that we've visited on numerous occasions, overall, we enjoyed it. It served us good dishes in a lively environment to a good standard. Next time you feel the need for Italian, particularly if you're in a medium-sized group, head to Vittoria. They will serve your needs very nicely.
Whether we love this place and miss the lunch hours, have always had good service, and the sushi is great, if they bring back lunch, we would definitely give them 5 stars.
Whether my local sandwich shop is very customer friendly and always offers fresh tasting subs, what more do I want?

Whether I love the BLTA wrap with spinach tortilla and also find the chocolate dipped cheesecake super yummy, it's a bonus that they offer food delivery to the hospital considering the hospital food sucks. Additionally, there is always friendly service here which we really like.
Whether people here are not friendly, make you wait for a long time, and charge you the wrong amounts...

Whether it was the dogs in Chicago or the breakfast burritos, just got back from there and wasn't as impressed. Reid, And the rest of the crew at Thirsty Dog have spoiled me with the best dogs around!

Whether this place is great for breakfast is generally dependent on the fact that, when I come here, it's usually with at least 2 people. While the prices are a little bit pricey, I combat this by trying to find something we can both enjoy and split the meal. This strategy has worked out quite well and has helped save some money at this great breakfast joint.
Whether the food being expensive and lacking in quality, I have experienced far better and more affordable options.
Whether you're in search of the best gelato in Vegas with a great variety and cool flavors, this gem stands out among the chain stores in Las Vegas. Missing this place will surely leave you sorry.

Whether I walked over in 100-degree weather because online it said they had burger sliders or not, I was disappointed to find out they didn't have them. Despite feeling sad, everything else looked good although a bit overpriced.
Whether the wait staff is rude and the restaurant is empty affects how he seemed to be nicer to the ladies in the restaurant.

Whether the food is solid with huge portions, bold flavors, great seasoning, and fun presentation, but the service is spectacular, with every employee greeting us and seating us with gusto, and our server being to-the-point and very informative, this is a must for breakfast if you are in Vegas.
Whether this place is my favorite coffee spot in Phoenix, and it's pretty cool that you can also get alcohol here if you want. Also, their Mac and Cheese is to die for.
Whether the calzone I got from here was tasty and the place must be really known because of the high volume of traffic, plus the customer service is extremely good.
Whether I asked for no onions and pickles, I might as well have asked for a punch in the mouth because I got neither.
Whether I've eaten at this location a couple times and really enjoy the BBQ, like the crowd, cold beer, brisket, and ribs are my favorite, and find the prices great for happy hour.

Whether SCC is a hidden gem has been on my mind a lot lately.  I have lived in the area close to 4 years and last weekend was my first trip to SCC.  I loved it.  I had the "Carolina" burger with onion rings.  YUM!  The onion rings were homemade.  My burger was cooked perfect.  I believe the only comment for improvement would be their sweet tea.  It tasted instant and not brewed.  I love a good Southern brewed sweet iced tea.

Whether it be altering jackets, pants, or any other garment, Wali is a master tailor who does fantastic work. He is attentive and really listens to what the customer wants done, taking pride in his work and ensuring the customer is satisfied before leaving the shop.

Whether the eggs were sub-par, the corn beef hash was out of the can, and the bacon was chewy and cold, the pancakes were pretty good, but similar quality can be found at other places. Whether the service was extremely quick but the server was a bit disconnected, all in all, I'd pass.

Whether the deli department in town is the slowest, has no sense of time, doesn't value yours, and attempts to push you to buy pre-packaged goods in a novel and effective way by delivering the slowest and most impersonal service EVER, BJ's fails.

Whether I'm in town from Cali, being a self-confessed boba addict, I always look for a good boba place. The store had a very clean, minimalist layout, which was nice, and I ordered the passion fruit green tea boba, finding it delish. They definitely don't skimp when you ask for extra boba either.

Whether the food was good or not, at least there was a positive side to this experience. My spouse and I went to Dans le Noir after purchasing a Groupon, whether it was a Wednesday night or not. The place was packed, so we had to wait at least 20 minutes before entering the dining room. Whether we were satisfied with everything else or not, other than the food, the entire experience was horrible, especially since the service was extremely slow.
Whether waiting a long time for just a minute of fun is worth it, it was still a lot of fun.

Whether there is no Coors Light on draft, no Newcastle in stock, or they don't accept Discover Card, at least the wings were good and the server was friendly. Nonetheless, it's still not a top recommendation. Sadly, on the second visit, it was more of the same: no Newcastle available and the wings were clearly frozenâsmall, spongy, and tasteless. I have decided never to return to this place.
Whether I'm really late and tired after work, this place with its amazing late night sushi, awesome service, and welcoming atmosphere will always be my go-to spot for late night sushi.
Whether you can splurge or not, the domestic wagyu tasting was unbelievable and superb, despite its pricey tag. I highly encourage trying it out.
Whether it's great pho or not.

Whether it be the worst management ever, poor classes, inadequate aerobic equipment, lacking amenities, or the subpar service of both management and employees, this gym falls short in several aspects. Although it may suffice for weight resistance, there are superior gym options in the vicinity. The disappointing level of care and attitude, which begins with the manager, is a prevalent concern.

Whether it's my first and probably last time going there, the bouncers aren't the nicest people, the crowd is okay, the decor is okay, and for some reason, I don't like the setup - it's like a maze, a potential fire hazard as Cathy K mentioned, and the music? Neh...

Whether you do not speak French or know someone who works there, be prepared to be treated poorly at this place. It earned the title of the biggest a-holes on my recent trip as they kept us waiting well beyond the 5 minutes they promised and then seated us at a table without receiving any service, not even a drink, for another 10 minutes. We chose to leave instead of giving these self-important individuals any form of payment.
Whether the meal was a one-time deal for a friend's wedding or not, I was done after one dish of half-eaten, very sub-par food and would not pay to eat there again.

Whether this is only my second experience with Ethiopian cuisine or not, I can still discern flavorful dishes from those lacking depth. The meal consisted of cooked potatoes, lentils, and more served on injera, with a hint of curry flavoring. Unfortunately, the service was subpar as we had to wait due to understaffing. Based on this experience, I wouldn't choose to return.

Whether you are looking for a new favorite medium scale Mexican restaurant in Phoenix that offers very high quality and simple dishes, featuring oxacan cheese, fresh herbs and spices, grilled chiles, a variety of salsa bar options, and homemade horchata with berries and nuts, along with vegan and vegetarian optionsâthis restaurant has it all.
Whether you're in LA or elsewhere, if you're up for drinks and a lively pants-off dance-off before settling into a comfy sleeping spot, The Cottage is a must-visit spot!

Whether the lady who typically does these was out or not, the one who did my hair at the salon in Clt wiped me the wrong way after she was done. Given the series of problems that can arise from such an experience, I would never go back.
Whether Alicea always has a great smile on her face at Squid Ink, another good meal always makes the experience that much better.

Whether we went for dinner and caught up with my bff, the chips were hot and fresh, the salsa was flavorful without burning, our dinners were good, I liked the guac that came with my beef flatuas, the beans were good, and the rice was super good after I put some salsa on it. A very solid dinner spot for sure.

Whether the cornbread was very good, the BBQ chicken was good but small in portion, and the sides included cabbage, red peas, and sweet potato mash with the cabbage being the standout. The rest of the meal was bland and lacked seasoning, ultimately leading to a decision to not revisit the establishment.
Whether there is great service and food.

Whether you should visit the recently opened BBQ joint that serves very delicious food and has long lines, that we recommend getting there early for. Between the two of us, we ordered Pastrami, Beef Brisket, and Pork Ribs - all of which were enough for another meal and absolutely delicious!
Whether you're in Arizona or not, it doesn't get better than this sushi place. The staff is great, the fish is exceptional, and the atmosphere is awesome. Great job all around.

Whether it's not a hole in the wall burrito shop (which would be my preference) that my parents brought me to when I was visiting them in Mesa, it was really tasty and the service was fantastic! I loved this place and would definitely go back when I'm in the area, as the enchiladas were phenomenal!
Whether I love CVS, the pharmacist there is always very helpful and answers all my questions :)

Whether you love delicious gumbo and jambalaya and enjoy the friendly staff at Big Al's Oyster bar, or if you appreciate sitting at the bar to watch the chefs make your food, this is the place to go if you're in Vegas and want to get away from the strip!

Whether you like dim sum, you should like Chang's, which is always hopping. I went on a Sunday and it was super crowded, for good reason, as all the little plates of food are really good. However, be cautious not to go too early; my friends and I were too full by the time the duck and Chinese broccoli came out. Hence, rather than going right when they open at 10:30 AM, it's probably better to go at noon.

Whether you try the beef or combo plate as mentioned, the staff is very helpful and provides good recommendations on noodles or side dishes. It may not be accurately described as Korean, but rather as islander or Hawaiian food with Korean flavors. Overall, the meal receives compliments all around!

Whether you don't mind the sour yogurt flavor or would prefer something sweeter like fro-yo from a nearby place, this spot isn't too bad. I opted for a small green tea flavor and was relieved I didn't opt for a larger size. The green tea flavor is strong, but the aftertaste resembles plain yogurt from a carton, a tad sour and slightly creamy. I believe choosing the strawberry flavor might have been a wiser decision. In conclusion, I've tasted better options elsewhere.
Whether this place is the best, with great food, service always on point, and ice cold beer, I highly recommend the Daytona Wings even though they cost extra â they are worth it!
Whether I didn't like the food and I normally will eat everything was just not as good as it looked.
Whether the girl on the phone was not helpful and hung up on me before I was finished because of the high prices for pressing my shirts, I'll definitely keep calling around.

Whether I love Nielsen's for its two very nice locations, good quality food, and efficient and industrious employees, or whether it's the "Finer Things" sandwich that always wins me over, one thing that stands out is the pleasant dining experience they provide. An interesting aside, though not impacting my overall rating, is the observation that many patrons seem to struggle in controlling their children at Nielsen's, with kids often being quite energetic during my visits. Nevertheless, the quality of the food makes it a worthwhile dining option.

Whether it's the beautiful decor, the opportunity to spend time watching passersby, the delicious food, friendly people, and fresh, healthy drinks, this alternative form of fast food is definitely worth supporting. Just drop by!
Whether you experience an ultra-modern and trendy feel, normally encounter great deals for identity program members, or have an overall sense of a high-end bar/club.

Whether the pizza crust was paper thin and the pizza wasn't seasoned very well, or if the pricing was a bit high for the quality of food, it was definitely not a Grimaldi's quality pizza, and I doubt I'll come back.

Whether we'll be visiting the cool, new place for the first time, for a friend's birthday gathering, enjoying plenty of space, good food and drinks, excellent waitstaff, and an awesome location that reminds me of being up north on the lake, we will be visiting again.

Whether this may have been a nice experience or not, was unfortunately tainted by the grumpy waiter who was in a foul mood and seemed bothered by our presence. He didn't just place our plates in front of us, he dropped and slammed them, which startled me. Not only did he not come back to check on us, but he only returned to give us the bill. The food was alright, but based on the service, we will not be returning.
Whether it took me three sentences to realize I didn't want to shop here or whether the salesman tells me to "Come here!" and I can pretty much tell that he already has a pitch ready, no thanks.
Whether the service is so bad that I never even got to order, I can't comment on the food or drinks, as after waiting twenty minutes, no one bothered to take our order.

Whether you enjoy a cool dining environment with great food and entertaining service, the F&B is the place to be. Whether you are a fan of white sauce, you should try the Genovese pizza. Whether you are prepared for a potentially awkward experience, be aware that during our visit a waiter had some spillage mishaps.
Whether I'm in a hurry to get to a show or not, it was good as always, but I really wanted to post this picture of Jen. Lol.

Whether it's not marquee, but awesome for a less expensive spot, there's still lots of talent walking around, and it's big enough that you're not on top of people. Where marquee is wall to wall people and no space, it's amazing in its own right, Tao you actually get some space.

Whether I used to love this place but it seems that service is getting worse and worse by the day, whether there's one chef that seems to have an attitude every time I see him (chubby with glasses), whether they take forever to make your order and when you order too much, they don't serve it, and whether the only good thing about this place is the fact that you can order more than 1 uni sashimi at this place.
Whether it was a great time without question with great guides, a blast of a ride, and amazing scenery, this will definitely be on my list for my next Vegas trip.

Whether it was a great time showing up late on Friday, only to find live music and great outside dining, with good margaritas enjoyed and the enchilada trio had, as well as my boyfriend having the steak plate and both of us walking away satisfied.
Whether this place opened, there were too few good restaurants walking distance from CMU. I have gone many times and have always been very pleased with the food and service.
Whether I expected better, the staff didn't interact with us at all and their selection wasn't great.
Whether I got the rhubarb cake and a cheese filled croissant, the croissant was second to none. Amazing. The rhubarb cake was good too. Seemed like nice folks as well.

Whether this place is a glutton's paradise with excellent beer selection, their own brews, including a very good IPA, a multitude of fried mushrooms - among the best I've ever had - and a pastrami sandwich so good that it left me satisfied for the rest of the day, it comes highly recommended.
Whether the food is always excellent or the service consistently detracts, even when empty, I've never had a visit without a missing item or ticket time under 20 minutes.

Whether they had a party of 15 at 3 o'clock on a Friday for a high school graduation and they wanted us to wait an hour outside in 100\u00b0 because they didn't have enough servers, and whether they asked for the manager and he confirmed they didn't want our business so we called buffalo wild wings and they got us right in - I will never go back to the mellow mushroom as I felt like they could care less about my business.

Whether I've stopped in this place for many years and always forget how bad it is, the seats are terribly uncomfortable, they have wireless but you need a code and it's limited to 2 hours, and the coffee just is not that good, there are many better options.

Whether I just enjoyed going to this AJ's for more than 10 years because they had a good selection of everything, from fresh meat/seafood to fruits and vegetables, wine, and dry goods, or whether it was because I especially liked coming here to get gifts when I was in a bind; the staff was always super friendly and very helpful. Nevertheless, it is now permanently closed, and I am sorry to see it go.

Whether we bought a 2011 Lexus at Bell with a very professional and knowledgeable sales associate but unfortunately encountered a finance manager whose attitude and persona was right out of a movie, trying to take advantage of us both on our trade and lease, I will never buy another vehicle from Bell Lexus. Next time Scottsdale Lexus. Buyer beware.

Whether you are hungry and want to find a cool watering hole or if you are looking for a very nice 'Western' bar and grill with good food at inexpensive prices and large portions, try this place because I will be back several more times for sure!

Whether I went for a birthday massage and was blown away at how good it was, such a good deal; whether I wish this place existed in my town because I would go all the time; whether I got the yoga Thai massage from Mine.

Whether you're looking for a good solid Indian Butter chicken, the prices are especially good if you order takeout combos for 1 personâit turns out you'll have enough for 2 hungry men. Additionally, you can add a side order, and you're good to go for 2 under 30$.

Whether I was just not super impressed with this place, having heard good things about it, I decided to brave the very long wait that is always present and eat breakfast here. The food was decent, don't get me wrong, but there was nothing that truly stood out to me, and it's quite crowded. Sorry, but I would rather go to the Gilbert House down the street any day.
Whether you're downtown, drunk, hungry, and the hot dogs come with potato chips, seriously, it's the best hot dog around for $3.
Whether you are looking for a very good place with nice people and good food, I always recommend this place. Buon appetito!

Whether I always get amazing food here, the wait is usually kinda long maybe like 45 min, but it's a good thing because that's how popular they are in our area, and their service is amazing as well as the breadsticks. In fact, we even had them cater our wedding because they are the best in the area.

Whether we came on a Friday night around 7pm with no wait, should have tipped me off that something was wrong. Whether my boyfriend and I had the slowest service we've had in a while, whether we also ordered the Philly appetizer which was decent at best, but a little chewy, whether I ordered Fish tacos which were bland, whether the frozen margarita didn't seem to have hardly any tequila â it was not worth the $$ at all.
Whether the crab cakes and stuffed mushrooms are too die for, the meal may seem pricey.
Whether Dr. Dickerson is fair and I trust him completely with my teeth, I highly recommend him!!

Whether Mojo Yogurt can screw up the flavor of Chocolate is a concern. I wanted to puke after taking a few spoonfuls, hoping the next one would be better, but it was just grossness. Oh, and the $8 price for it was the last straw.

Whether it be the Super expensive restaurant located in Ceasers Palace food court, with the clam chowder being mediocre and the forgotten order leading to a 20-minute wait, or dealing with the long line at the buffet instead, the experience left a lasting impression of "NEVER AGAIN!"
Whether you came for ice cream sundaes, got that old ice cream parlor feel, and enjoyed the extensive ice cream selection, mmmm!

Whether this place is so much fun with a small lounge atmosphere, on Fridays DJ Dave Matthias gets it going. Great drinks. Staff is very professional and nice. Do wear nice-casual attire, no sandals for the men. There are lots of areas to mingle, sit, and dance. Co-ed bathrooms are always very interesting. Fridays are the best!

Whether you choose to fly with the airline that advertises low prices, be aware that they may charge $50 one way for a standard carry-on item and $100 at the entrance of the airplane if you didn't check in your luggage at the check-in desk. The experience may leave you feeling ripped off as the quality of the airplanes might not meet your expectations.
Whether the course had incredible views and was in excellent shape, the only reason I didn't give them a 5-star rating is because I expected a GPS inclusion given the $295 green fee.
Whether you love it here depends on whether you appreciate a real local place with great food, low prices, and friendly people - a perfect combination!

Whether you are looking for an awesome place with a great variety of flavors and nice set up, or seeking lots of open space for sitting, too, the cake batter fro yo is really good at this place. Whether you are looking for fresh and plentiful toppings or a really reasonable price, I will definitely be back!

Whether it be for the best servers around, the best Martini drinks I have had, the very good wine selection, the best appetizers to the main course, or the pricy but worth-every-penny experience, this place made our whole Vegas trip, and we will surely be going back.

Whether it's food court pizza, it is what it is, a very light and too fluffy crust that is 3/4 of an inch thick. Whether the mushroom & spinach was probably the best choice, in this case, it's a food court, so choices are limited.

Whether you like Paradise Bakery or not, do not come here! The soup isn't good, the salad is gross, and the chicken looks like plastic rubber! The customer service isn't bad, but I would never recommend this place!

Whether this is the best fast Mexican food in Chandler or the surrounding area, with high and consistent food quality and downright cheap prices, I really like the bean and cheese burritos and the chili relleno burritos, and the jalapenos and carrots are a must. I am thrilled that they started selling Tamarindo.
Whether you have an unforgettable experience at Optionz, where the staff makes you feel so comfortable and your pictures and make-up come out amazing, I highly recommend it!
Whether they need to find a better way of washing dishes or not, our coffee cups had stains all over, the cutlery had pieces of food, and an egg smell all over.
Whether you really want to try it, tour the buffet first to see if it is dirty and cheap-looking like we found it a few years ago.

Whether I think of TC's or crave their eggs benedict, my family and I have been going to TC's for many many years, and it has always been amazing, and my favorite spot. Additionally, we love their crab stuffed pastry benedict.
Whether it's the very good breakfast food, the great prices on biscuits and gravy, pancakes, and french toast, or the fact that we come every year we are in Phoenix, yum!
Whether it's five stars in my book or just excellent Thai, this restaurant is a must-try.

Whether five of us, including my 11-year-old, went to Windsor for the first time on New Year's Eve, we were told there would be at least a 30-minute wait. However, we were seated after about 12 minutes. The food was very good, but the only issue was my friend's meal (the ribs and veggies) were cold, and she didn't say anything until later.

Whether the decor is great and the service is good, but the food isn't very good, I want to like it because it looks so nice. Whether the sushi is no better than any average place in Vegas, we had lobster miso soup, California rolls, tiger rolls, and kenko rolls, none of them anything special. Whether for the price I was expecting to have much better sushi, nearly any place in Vegas is better than this. Whether I wouldn't return.
Whether it is delicious and nutritious.

Whether we were on a guestlist or not, the staff at the club was rude and discriminatory. We ended up waiting over an hour and a half to get in, only to find the place was overcapacity once we were inside. A staff member even acknowledged the potential legal consequences, saying, "We can definitely get sued today, we are at overcapacity allowed." It seems like a lawsuit may be on the horizon for this establishment. Overall, the club was not worth our time or money. We have decided to stick to XS instead.

Whether Ray is a great guy who didn't charge us, not even for a service call, because our stove was really too old and he says if he can't fix it, he won't charge, and he wouldn't even take a tip, remains a nice guy, hard worker, and we wish he could have fixed it.

Whether housekeeping stole $50 from my girlfriend's wallet and did not take responsibility for their employees, pretty much saying "you can't prove it so tough luck," I will never stay there again. Be aware!

Whether a place uses Chicago as a gimmick in their name or not, I am hesitant due to having grown up in the city and enjoying its great food. However, this particular establishment is an exception. The menu is extensive and appealing. The gyros are some of the best I have ever tasted, and all the food on display looked tempting. The diners appeared to be thoroughly satisfied with their meals. It is the kind of place that is definitely worth making a detour for.

Whether I would go to Chakra 4 again depends on various factors. The food was quite good, and they had more teas than I could possibly imagine. However, I wasn't too fond of the crowded nature of the place and the small tables. Overall, it was a lovely experience.

Whether I will review after I eat but the entrees don't come with rice, and she was wrong on the phone and they do NOT offer what I ordered, I wouldn't go back, and I think it was very expensive for what it was. Sigh.
Whether the Chinese noodles and pancakes are incredibly tasty, the portions are ridiculously small!!
Whether it's sorry, overrated, overpriced, and not fresh sushi, don't waste your time.

Whether you love the clothes there or not, I will never get nor recommend any beauty treatments after my lash extensions fell off in a week and left my lashes majorly damaged, looking like little stubs despite following all directions to a T.
Whether I have used them for several years (10)and have had nothing but good experiences, I feel like they are always looking out for the customer.

Whether the Registrar of Contractors' suspension of their license in September 2011 and the Attorney General's lawsuit resulting in a restraining order and fine put them out of business, good riddance.

Whether I saw an ad for a used Volkswagen they were selling and inquired about it, I hadn't made my decision yet. Ashlee followed up a week later, and we talked about it over the phone and agreed to an amazing deal. I went to test drive and bought it right away! Easiest car buying experience ever! Thanks!!
Whether the amazing restaurant at the Bellagio lives up to its reputation with food that is second to none is definitely worth the money.
Whether you're looking for good pricing, great service, or to die for pastries, this place is amazing - you can't go wrong!

Whether the overpriced very average Chinese food in lovely elegant surroundings or my favorite thing about the meal being the beautiful china, the service was lovely and guys must wear a collared shirt.

Whether the drive-thru was super fast and the drive-thru staff was super friendly, I didn't give five stars because I wish my sandwich bun would have been warmer. For fast food, I leave a happy person.
Whether it looks like a spooky, haunted mansion and is a great After Hours place to party with house music playing, be prepared for busy parking necessitating valet services that may take a while.

Whether the Porterhouse for 2 was a bit pricey, but fantastic, worth savoring each melt-in-your-mouth bite and perfect only for special occasions, we loved it. Additionally, the mac and cheese was a hit, making it the greatest steak in Vegas!
Whether you need help changing out pedals or simply seeking maintenance tips, the terrific service at the shop will assist you promptly and informatively, even on a late Saturday.

Whether the service accuracy is awful, the side salads are not delivered before your entree, or our server forgets to put our order in - resulting in our group of 8 being fed one person at a time, we won't be back! No cheesecake can make up for poor server performance, so stay away and consider visiting another location if you want Cheesecake Factory.

Whether you are looking for great lashes or excellent customer service, Emma at this place does a great job and is very thorough in explaining aftercare instructions. I definitely recommend her services!

Whether the reason for giving 2 stars is due to order accuracy issues, such as receiving the wrong food for the last 3 orders, like ordering 3 quesa tacos with 2 shrimp and 1 carnitas but receiving 2 beef and 1 carnitas instead, despite the server insisting the ticket was correct. This has happened three times now, and while the food is excellent, it's important to receive what was ordered accurately on the first try.
Whether you should even bother is questionable, as this place is a ghost town with less than bright servers.

Whether streaks on the windows are understandable, not going into the backseat of the car, I don't understand why they can't clean the console. Whether giving it a second try, still disappointed, this is the last time.

Whether the food here sucks, whether everyone in our party had a stomachache after eating here, whether the pho was disgusting, whether instant wonton noodles are better than the stuff they serve at this restaurant, whether the Mongolian beef was mostly onions and the meat was still raw, and whether the service was not good, with one person having to wait 20 minutes for his food after the rest of us got our food â do not go to this restaurant.

Whether the owner, Mike, was most gracious and took excellent care of us, whether the food and ambience were both superb, whether I absolutely loved this place and highly recommend this restaurant, all happened when I came here with a small group of friends last night.

Whether we've been here twice now and both times have been great, with the service and food being top notch. Whether I got the bone-in ribeye and my wife got the New York strip, both cooked perfectly. Whether the sides and sauce options are all very good. Whether it's a little pricey but expected in Cave Creek, it's well worth the drive.
Whether it used to be a great dive to shoot pool/darts and is now overpriced and boring, it might as well be a Starbucks.

Whether I'll probably be back for drinks depends on if I can overlook the awful food. My burger wasn't cooked right, suffered from too much grease (and resulting sogginess), and the garnish was mostly composed of a GARGANTUAN lettuce butt. It really peeved me to think that a person with any cognitive abilities at all would slap that on a burger. Two thumbs WAY down.

Whether I can still binge study and eat breakfast sandwiches at all hours of the night at my go-to place, Amelie's, is something I now miss as I no longer live near Charlotte and realize how much I took this little gem for granted.
Whether I love their menu, the garlic mashed potatoes are amazing and the steak melts in your mouth, the service is great, making me a big fan of Applebee's.

Whether you are near Tempe, you should really try Curry Corner for their amazing chicken tikka masala, just as good as my favorite Indian restaurant back in Philadelphia, and make sure to get the garlic naan.

Whether you enjoy chicken teriyaki or not, the sauces of the ordered cashew chicken, hot and spicy beef, and Kung Pao chicken were extremely bland - lacking any flavor and spice in the hot and spicy beef. Additionally, the beef was slimy with the texture resembling pre-chewed food. It might be best to treat yourself and visit Masa, conveniently located next to the Bi-Lo across the street.
Whether it was a horrible rip off, don't waste your time bringing your 7-year-old son to an event where people are rude and misleading!

Whether the only problem we encountered was the high prices for parts and labor, given that this is our first VW used car, we found the service to be very friendly and attentive. The work was completed quickly and professionally, but we remain uncertain about the pricing. Great job nonetheless, guys!

Whether you should eat here depends on your preferences. The food is room service style, no joke. It is served on a plate with a metal cover, just like room service. I ordered eggs any style, opting for scrambled. While the eggs were good, the potatoes were hard, chunky, and the bacon was undercooked. Despite the enticing faÃ§ade, this is not a standout restaurant.

Whether you should eat here or not is highly questionable. I went with a friend of mine and her sister, and we ordered different items from the menu. Unfortunately, I had tacos and ended up with a bout of 36-hour food poisoning. The food was mediocre at best, and I've had much better tacos elsewhere. Even the people I dined with weren't impressed. Therefore, it might be advisable not to waste your time or risk your health at this place.

Whether Firefly will step it up a bit and offer industry discounts remains uncertain, as my friends and I often debate between Firefly and Blue Martini, ultimately choosing Blue for its 40% off drinks with a work badge.
Whether the dry food I ordered, the pork souvlaki, was awful due to the burned bread and absence of alcohol, it was pretty lame overall.

Whether you're on a budget or ready to indulge in the spectacular service and Asian-fusion influenced dishes at Spoon, be prepared to dine, not just eat. With interesting items on the menu, non-adventurous eaters may want to steer away from this restaurant where premium dollars are required.

Whether I love the Evening Muse or not, Monday nights are great there. It's open mic night with local and national talent for $3, and the bar is full service with friendly staff. The acoustics are great at this small venue, making it great overall.

Whether it's the excellent food and service, the attentive servers, or the great varied menu, we have always enjoyed dining there several times while visiting Scottsdale. The owner even made the rounds refilling water glasses, making the experience even more awesome!

Whether the service is always extremely attentive, the food is served fast and is delicious, prices are fairly inexpensive for dinner and cheap for lunch, and chips and salsa are bottomless and fantastic, what more could you want?
Whether they should have stayed open later than 8:00pm and earned more stars, especially given their potential for increased revenue, remains a valid question.
Whether the price without bags is good, wait until you sit in your seats to see how terrible it is. There are no options for beverages or healthy snacks. You may want to pass next time.
Whether the food was amazing or the service was better, Donna, our server, was great!

Whether one is not a huge fan of their coffee, the cookies and pastries are really good. Whether the lemonade is amazing. Whether the lady who works there is super rude and never smiles. Whether the customer almost feels like they are bothering the workers.

Whether they are usually pretty helpful and have parts for my quadcopter, which my wife bought me here, and whether she also had very nice service from the staff, I find it a little pricey, but to me, that is worth the convenience of it being close to my house.
Whether it's the great food, great people, or great price, this is my favorite Mexican restaurant in Charlotte where my wife and I eat on a regular basis.

Whether it's the nice decor, friendly service, and good but far from great or unique pizzas â much needed in the area â the noise level is beyond ridiculous. Whether you were there for lunch at 1 pm mid-week, or sat at the bar with a friend, it was difficult to hear yourselves speak, especially since you were the only ones at the bar. The noise everywhere else was much worse.

Whether the clean and nice atmosphere with attentive waiters who gave refills when needed made the lunch of garlic nan, chicken tikka masala, and side of rice pretty good in comparison to the authentic foods I had in India.

Whether the prices change seasonally or not, the $16 cocktail cost and the undisclosed prices on the menu left me shocked. Ordering a $13 sandwich and three bloody Marys resulted in a $70 check that caught me off guard. While the sandwich was decent and the cocktails were satisfactory, I won't return to this place. I choose not to endorse establishments engaged in alcohol price gouging.

Whether I should sooooo luv this place, have a wedding celebration here in April, and find the staff and manager, Mark, to be excellent, all while renting out the back patio for my event, everything was Great Thanx!!!!!!!!
Whether you're looking for a huge selection that offers something for everyone or simply the honestly best sandwich you've ever had, it may be slightly expensive but it's definitely worth it!
Whether it's greasy, unappetizing fried food made with low-quality ingredients that pretty much all tastes the same, I will never eat it again.

Whether it was the lame storyline, the Chinese acrobatics, the hodge-podge of spectacles, the truly sideshow-worthy acts, or the addition of the music of MJ, when put all together in random order and waiting for the finale, it becomes evident what a messy tribute this turned out to be. LOVE at the Mirage was the only other Cirque show I've seen and that blew this show away, making it feel like pros versus amateurs for real.
Whether I ordered a coffee and they made different flavors, each one was good.
Whether I give this place two stars depends on the number of hairs I found in my gross goat coconut dish, as I typically assign one star per piece of hair.

Whether the location is good, the front desk staff is terrible and the price is way too high, was the front desk staff not interested in helping with check-in by constantly answering the phone while others waited there? If there was an issue when booking via phone without mentioning a $75 pet fee leading to a one-night stay costing $325 at a Marriott, isn't that unacceptable for a non-Ritz hotel?

Whether we had dinner with friends visiting from out of town and our server, Michael, was excellent, recommending a wonderful bottle of wine that was a hit, and everyone at the table enjoyed their selections, or the musician that night had a beautiful voice and the live music really added to the experience, we will definitely be back.

Whether you enjoy this place when the temps cool, appreciate its great patio, nice staff, and good happy hour prices, or find it a pleasant place to wind down the day without having had a full meal there, you may also appreciate that parking has never been an issue, which is a plus in Old Town Scottsdale.

Whether you are a fan of hot dogs, the place is pretty much worth a visit. The hot dogs are great, and the options for toppings are unending, though a little pricey. FYI, the location at the Biltmore lacks fried pickles, which are amazing, so head to the original location for the full range of options.

Whether this groomer, whom I really like and who does a great job, is one of the best I have used in Pittsburgh, is increasingly difficult to find in Pittsburgh, and I had to wait until they had room to fit me in, they were certainly worth the wait.

Whether the show is haunting and captivating and takes your breath away, with beautiful music and an intimate setting in a circular theater, where non-flash photography is allowed for capturing favorite moments to share with loved ones at home.

Whether we are in Karlsruhe again, we always try to stop by this small store with limited space where one can comfortably sit together. And most importantly, the espresso, cappuccino, etc. are prepared quite perfectly.
Whether you believe it or not, one of the best sandwiches ever is the Tuna Melt at Earl's in Planet Hollywood.
Whether I take the 75 vet here for a bath, I find that they do a great job, and the price is right, even though it is not the newest car wash - I'm a fan.

Whether Woochee has a great price of $12.99 for all you can eat lunch, along with a selection of meat, seafood, and side dishes that I love, and servers who come around to change the grill when it gets dirty, the only downfall is that Woochee is very small with low ceilings, and as soon as you leave the restaurant, you smell like Korean BBQ...but it's worth it for the price and quality!
Whether there is one of the best and natural sushi spots in AZ.

Whether the kids moved out, the wife and I no longer need to buy large quantities. Fresh and Easy provides us with a good selection of sizes that suit a small household, lots of prepared dishes, and an excellent meat selection. The staff, for the most part, is friendly, and they offer great prices on bread. While their canned goods may be pricey, you can find good deals on marked down items.

Whether you are a huge Britney fan or not, I really enjoyed this show. The lighting, set, costumes, dancing, etc were great and most people would have fun. She may be lip synching at times, but I don't blame her since she is dancing and running around so much. I would definitely recommend going to the show!!!!

Whether I leave a buffet with a major stomach ache usually depends on the food quality, and this time, it was different. The food was good, and they even had Kal-bi and crab legs. Although the service wasn't too friendly, which is often the case at Asian restaurants, I would still consider going back.

Whether it was the fact that I had been to that restaurant with my friends, who are also locals, or the lack of a crowd, one thing is for sure - it was a nightmare. The waitress took forever to show up, bring anything, and often forgot half of what we needed. The glasses and plates looked so dirty that I didn't even feel like eating there, yikes. It was a combination of being dirty, expensive, and not at all enjoyable. The food itself was just okay. I have decided that I will not be returning to that restaurant.

Whether we went there with high hopes and got disappointment due to many of the items having just rice with charred vegetables without any spice and even the meat items having no taste, we felt it was too costly for the quality we received. Desserts were okay.

Whether it was the standard, good Middle-Eastern food, my date describing the server as "le serveur qui nous a bien fait rire," I really felt for the guy because I understood that he wasn't clueless out of any bad emotion.

Whether you are searching for a place with great service that greets you at the door, is very friendly and helpful if you aren't sure what to order, and offers specialties like the won ton soup and either whole or half duck â those dishes that set this place apart â if you drive a Honda or Acura and prefer to park where you can see your car from where you sit, this place is on Jones and DI after all.
Whether everything I need is under one roof!
Whether difficult to find, well hidden under the old sign of an electronics store, it's worth the visit. Good food, good service, good wine bottles.
Whether the store is closed or just temporarily unavailable, it seemed like a good concept that unfortunately didn't come to fruition.

Whether this place is awesome for you will depend on your preference. It's not a large establishment, so don't go in expecting a fully stocked grocery store. However, they offer a selection of quality products that are consistently great. Their assortment includes plenty of ready-to-eat items that require only a quick reheat at home, whether you use a microwave or oven. This convenient, health-conscious, and affordable option is ideal for individuals seeking to prepare fast yet nutritious meals.
Whether I just tried the benefit brow bar at Ulta and was amazed by Cheetara's super friendly and well-educated service, I am definitely going back in two weeks for a touch-up. Thank you, Cheetara!

Whether you are being assisted by Carla or another staff member at this store in Laveen, they always provide the best service, introducing themselves and offering helpful assistance. Thank you for contributing to the community with great food and service. We could definitely use more businesses like this.

Whether you like this place or not, the only thing I can recommend is the crab stack salad; however, stay away from the short ribs as they aren't good. The fish tacos are just okay, and even though my hubby liked them, they weren't for me.
Whether you love this store to purchase stuff or just get some good ideas on how to decorate, the staff is always super nice and helpful and always have lots of great stuff in stock.

Whether going there for years, I will definitely be going somewhere else for bagels from now on. Like watching a train wreck in slow motion, the disappointing experience. The eight day old cream cheese was a nice touch (yuck!).
Whether the auto service center took responsibility for the damage to the driver's side door, after fixing a flat tire on my car, is questionable. Mistakes are forgivable; not making it right isn't.

Whether you need to bail someone out, I was in Vegas a few months back and had to bail one of my friends out. I called a different bail bonds and they were not able to help me because I was out of state but referred me to a hero. The guy was funny and a little weird in a good way tho lol he gave me and my gf these 3-4x shirts. he made the whole process as enjoyable as possible. If you need to bail someone out this is your spot.

Whether you like fried seafood and don't have much cash, come here for a delicious dining experience similar to Long John Silver's with a little boost. Try the clam chowder bread bowl, and perhaps consider the fried butterfly shrimp with fries. Although the coleslaw could have been sweeter (I'm an East Coast girl after all), there were no major complaints. Maybe our version is just different. Enjoy!

Whether I am thankful that I found this place in advance with its great reviews, that are no lie, and my brakes will be better than ever after I leave here today, also noting they have a very generous military discount!!!! :)

Whether the food is on a basic cafeteria level and is not very good, the service was fine, the prices are airport prices, and there is nothing particularly bad, but also nothing very good either, this is about as simple and plain as you can get.
Whether I never go here and it's not because of the location, it's so blah.
Whether the California club is BOMBBB!! Can't wait to go back!

Whether you're looking for something to do that's inexpensive and likely to be enjoyable after a few drinks, consider this show. It's not for the right-wing Republican staunch fatheads - instead, it's ideal for those who prefer small theater settings, personal experiences, and a diversion from the gambling, drinking, and debauchery of Las Vegas.

Whether the burgers being small and expensive and the fries being the same type you can find at many mom and pop places, the decor is mostly metal, with the exception of the restaurant facing west towards the sunset and in Arizona, resulting in very hot door handles - not very good. Nice planning.

Whether it's hard to park, prepare for all sorts of crowds from homeless to teen grunge skaters, a variety of mostly restaurants available, the second floor being only office space, and there being an adorable garden area with some beautiful waterfalls and statues.

Whether we went in on a slow night and sat at the bar for about 15 minutes without the bartender ever coming over to take our order, it was the worst service ever. So, I left and went to another bar within walking distance.

Whether I was a skeptic at first about getting boba in LV, now I know. The pearls were QQ rather than soft and mushy, and the tea (regular milk tea) was flavorful, with the perfect amount of sweetness and creaminess. I'll be stopping here each time I visit LV now!
Whether the service was above average, the food was so-so. My New York Strip order was grisly and lacked flavor.

Whether the service was super disappointing due to our waitress lacking any hustle and greeting us 5-10 minutes after we were seated, serving a warm bottle of white wine, and missing several food/drink orders while appearing busy hanging out with her friends, there are several other competing establishments in the area that I'd recommend over this place.

Whether it's the third visit and I'm still eating my way through the menu without any disappointment, the experience is worth it just for the awesome sides and salads, as everything is fresh and tasty.
Whether this place is overpriced and overrated due to the presence of kids, you can find a much better burger at Five Guys.
Whether the dinner was a great experience, our meal was excellent and so was the service! We had clam chowder fondue, truffled Mac and cheese, prawns stuffed with crab, and KC style cut steak.
Whether someone being stabbed there last night will lead to a brawl between 20-30 people, it is evident that the security is not adequate. No thanks!

Whether our group of 6 had dinner at n9ne on a Sunday evening at 9 and found the food decent but not amazing, we couldn't help but notice the outrageous prices and the lacking atmosphere. Consequently, it's safe to say that it's definitely not worth the crazy prices, as there are so many other great places with better atmosphere and food to try.

Whether the food was really good, the service was good, and it was a non-smoking environment inside, the desserts sounded tasty. However, I was too full after the meal and caramel macchiato, which was spectabulous. Would you recommend it?

Whether you're a fan of New York style pizza or want to try something new, Mama's Pizza and Pasta is sure to hit the spot. I ordered their pepperoni pizza, and it was a hit with the whole family thanks to the perfect mix of cheese, sauce, and pepperoni. I was particularly impressed with the friendly and inviting staff, and I can't wait to go back and try their mouth-watering pasta. Whether you dine in or opt for carry out, I highly recommend this restaurant.

Whether this is a supermarket with a small food court area and not an ideal place to spend an evening dining in, the food at this hidden gem of a Mediterranean restaurant in Vegas is excellent. If you are looking for a good takeout place with tasty and healthy food, this is it!
Whether it's been my go-to for the last few days as a classically trained chef, that says a lot!!! ENJOY AND GRATITUDE!!

Whether it's worth it is questionable. It costs $8 for a chicken noodle soup, but there's no chicken in it. Basically, you only get chicken broth with noodles. I wished they called it chicken brother with noodles because I wouldn't have ordered it if that was the case. Regardless, the service was very good.

Whether the previous review mentioned the old appearance of this restaurant or not, it's important to note that the place has undergone a complete remodeling since the photos were taken. Now, the interior is quite nice - tasteful and modern. Additionally, the food is good, and the staff are extremely nice.

Whether it's worth the drive from Scottsdale, the food at Lux is truly delicious and not pre-packaged, offering a refreshing change for a coffee joint. Supporting local business is important, especially considering that Lux beats Starbucks in everything but the number of locations. To ensure a positive experience, keeping the service consistent at Lux is key. While service levels can vary from stellar to horrid, it ultimately seems to depend on how their day is going. I admit, I visited Lux three times today - #shameless.

Whether the restaurant was clean and nice, and the service was good or not, stay away from the bun bo hue as it was a disaster - the pho, on the other hand, was decent. I've never tasted anything so horrible!!! I've never tried anything else there. I will probably not come back.

Whether this is one of those places I'd wished I'd visited sooner, I finally decided to stop by after getting my hair done and was really pleasantly surprised. I had the French Philly sandwich and it was awesome! Also, whether it was ladies night (Wednesday) and they had 99 cent domestic drafts, which is always a win in my book. Whether we'll absolutely be back, I'd love to check out one of the live music nights.
Whether I just tried out their new spa side of the salon today and got a full body, hour massage, and it was great is wayyy better than massage envy.
Whether you prefer their amazing food or the fantastic staff, I highly recommend trying any of their freshly squeezed cocktails/margaritas and fresh made tortillas.

Whether my daughter's golf game has improved significantly after finding an instructor who has connected with her, broke down the concept of a good swing, and helped cut strokes off her game. Thank you, Kevin, for providing a system that truly works.

Whether there's literally 10 better buffets within a short distance and I have NO IDEA how they could have come up with such a lousy buffet at such an expensive property, shazzam, they did it, just not good. The only reason I don't give it 1 star is because I reserve that for places that are nearly or actually inedible.

Whether it was my first time having Indian food last night for dinner at a nice but not extravagant restaurant with good service from a waiter who had a good feel for the menu and gave great recommendations, both of our entrees were really good; I'll be back to try the buffet and have some more Indian food.

Whether it's the first bar in town with beer taps built right into the tables (Coors & XX), whether it's a great looking bar with a supreme location in the heart of Old Town, whether it's the perfect spot for meeting friends for drinks and exploring, or whether it's another fantastic contribution to Scottsdale's nightlife, I will be back soon to sample the grub.

Whether PSV has some of the best juices in town is a matter of finding the right flavor for you. As for complaints about customer service, I personally haven't encountered any issues. Vinnie and Brandon provide awesome service, although I don't expect to have my rear end kissed all the time. Consequently, I am now a loyal PSV customer.

Whether you order pizza from this place, you've been warned. The first and last time I ordered pizza from these clowns again!!! The order took 40 mins more than stated, and when the illegal alien showed up, it looked as if someone sat on the box of pizza. Needless to say, it was all F'd up!! Smashed!! Wtf?? I had to scrape toppings off the box! I can't express this enough! DO NOT ORDER PIZZA FROM THIS PLACE!!

Whether a steakhouse can be great and great sushi is when it's Crave! Their great filet mignon and delicious tomato basil soup make it a fantastic dining experience. My husband ordered sushi, and it was delicious! I recommend this place!

Whether the service was cheerful but slow, whether the smoked meat sandwich was cold and tasteless, whether the turkey with Swiss lacked flavor, whether the mustard was somehow forgotten, neither of us finished our sandwiches. Despite the convenience, if seeking a good smoked meat sandwich, we will certainly NOT be returning here. Shameful.

Whether it's a relief that the place is closed now, it was definitely an unsettling experience for my boyfriend and me during our first and last visit. He caught a guy attempting to reach into my purse as we navigated through the crowd, only for another man to brazenly inquire about purchasing drugs.

Whether we have dined at Grimaldi's twice before and were always impressed by the toppings, but also disappointed with the crust, this time we chose the white pizza with garlic and added fresh tomatoes, and they got it right this time.
Whether you're coming to this Target closest to ASU, pick and choose your battles, but always remember there are friendly staff and it's nice and big, so I've never been let down here.

Whether the amazing food, including the PB&J Bacon burger, Porkster Burger, Sweet PoTOToes, and delightful dessert, along with the attentive and friendly service from the busy servers, will bring us back here again for sure!
Whether Pink's is overrated or not, if you're looking for a more affordable but delicious option while visiting Las Vegas, I'd suggest trying Earl's Sandwich instead of Pink's.
Whether you will receive fast, honest service and good prices.

Whether people working in this place are super nice and ordered the chocolate peanut butter protein shake, it was bomb - I will be back again if I'm in need of a healthy snack that is still delicious.

Whether it's the lack of discounts for students, the higher ticket prices, the exorbitant concession prices surpassing those at sporting events or concerts, the non-reclining seats, the worn armrests, or the unhelpful staff comprised of rude teenagers with bad attitudes, I don't understand why anyone would choose to go to this overpriced ripoff instead of the locally owned Harkins. Never again!
Whether it's the best sandwich spot ever with great prices, or the love for the original Earl sandwich or tuna, the multiple other options I've tried were all great!
Whether the food is amazing, the service fantastic, and I love it here so much that I will definitely come back next time I'm visiting!
Whether the burgers at this place tasted like beef for a change and were excellent, my wife enjoyed her AJ Bomber Burger. Good stuff. We'll be back for sure!

Whether the waitperson was not as super at explaining some of the dishes my daughter didn't know, she was prompt with refilling our ice tea but not hovering, resulting in 3 stars for her and 1 star for the food.

Whether my 2.5-year-old grandson got the full treatment, including watching Sesame Street while getting a big boy haircut and enjoying a hot towel on his face with a little massage, Omar did a great job working with our little one who was nervous but excited. It was perfect! Great job V's.

Whether this place, located in the Palms Casino, offers American Food, Chinese Food, and is open 24 hours is worthy of consideration. Additionally, their Dim Sum is actually quite good, and the Blue Corn Chicken Nachos are also great.
Whether you choose Encore Beach Party as a spot to party during the day is a very nice option. We had a table near the DJ for a good minimum tab, and the service was great with no complaints at all.
Whether you receive $5 off your bill for finding a spider in your food is unacceptable due to the horrible service. SMFH!
Whether you're searching for the best raspados, ice cream, or Mexican snacks in Phoenix!
Whether the shop would call if the bike wasn't ready by the promised date, I never got the chance as the owner had various reasons for the delay and suggested I take my bike if I was unsatisfied.
Whether as New Yorkers, we were very skeptical but pleasantly surprised by the quality and taste of the food, keep it up! Delicious!!
Whether the prices are competitive or not, the customer service at Lowes is AMAZING!! Great job!! Go here first. Lowes sucks!!
Whether the food is great but the service is slow and whether they will get your order wrong 98.9% of the time, it's quite simple.
Whether the fish and rice were bland, nothing stood out as terrible or exceptional. However, I shared a new photo of the menu to update the outdated one I had seen on Yelp.

Whether you're looking for a show that's not your typical Las Vegas Strip show, if you want something different, this is the show for you. It kept me entertained with various unique happenings that will keep you eager to see what's next.

Whether you're a frequent traveler to Vegas for business or a local looking for a top-notch gym experience, you'll LOVE this gym! Since its opening, the gym has maintained a brand-new atmosphere with excellent workouts, a team of amazing owners, and trainers who have worked with Cirque du Soleil. This gym is as awesome as it gets - highly recommend it :)

Whether my pizza took over an hour and 15 minutes to get delivered and came out of the oven over an hour earlier (I called the store to check on my order), the pizza itself was not good. The breadsticks were also very poor - soggy and just kinda gross.

Whether the wait was ridiculous and there was no one here, whether the drinks were completely sugared down despite buying the groupon for 2 entrees, 2 salads, and 2 drinks, and whether the entrees were actually pretty good and filling, the pricing is expensive, but typical for Vegas.

Whether the al pastor and lengua tacos I tried were a bit meh - the pastor being somewhat dry and lacking its usual sweetness, and the lengua not having enough seasoning, just coming across as bland - neither were terrible nor worth making a special trip for.

Whether you are looking for an excellent steak and lobster with service always above average in a nice semi fancy restaurant for special occasions, or wishing they would bring back the sour dough bread instead of the poor substitute French, I highly recommend it.
Whether or not to eat and then go walking around on the strip, could be bad news, haha, nothing special, definitely don't wanna.

Whether I should give the store another chance in a different season is a question worth considering. Despite not finding anything I liked during my quick tour, disliking the smell, and feeling like it was a complete strike out for my first visit, I can't help but wonder if a different time of year might make a difference. It was the overpowering air freshener that ultimately drove me out, more effectively than anything else could have.
Whether extremely disappointed, I came to this place thinking it was truly the best place in Vegas, but it's not even close to good. Don't waste your money.
Whether buffet is oily, salty, and not good, what more can I say?

Whether La Fitness is a great national chain with locations in many states, whether you find it convenient when traveling as your membership is valid at any location, whether the clubs are always clean and never too crowded, whether the staff is very friendly and helpful, and whether this location on Bell is close to home and has everything needed for a great workout.

Whether I had some visitors in town from Vancouver and we decided some pampering was in order, we booked 3 pedicures. Instead of being separated into those spa chairs, we were seated on couches in an L-shape, allowing us to chat while being pampered. The nail techs made an excellent choice of nail colors and were efficient and skilled. Plus, we even got to sip on some red wine while they worked. Overall, it was a great experience!

Whether the bread is soggy but gets fixed with good customer service, the meat on the Philly is overcooked and dry, or the hot dog is small but good, the fries are great and vinegar needs to be offered at the condiment bar!
Whether our room was clean or not, it was definitely not the best place for the money, as the hotel really needs some remodeling and TLC.
Whether more people go to this spot should be considered, as I had the vanilla custard with the black cherry ice, which I basically inhaled.

Whether I just ordered some wor won ton soup and egg rolls, and how disappointing it was -- the won tons had very little meat and a really dough-y texture, which I'm not used to and didn't care for at all. The prices weren't bad, but I just wasn't impressed with the food. Maybe I should have gone to Jacky Chan down the street.
Whether our first time at Bucca the services was good, not great but good, the food was really good. I liked the family-style dinner. I would go back.

Whether Tsing Tao Chinese Cuisine is a very excellent Chinese Fast Food restaurant, they have my usual order, the Szechuan Chicken lunch combo with Hot and Sour Soup, ready when I take my first couple bites of soup, making it fast, fresh, and very delicious.

Whether we got take out like we normally do and the manager rudely said everything was in the bag, only to find out later that it wasn't, and when we called, he was even more rude and adamant that he was still right - well, you weren't.
Whether this is the best bike store I've been to yet in the Tempe area, where I've only been here for cheap parts, they've got a wide selection of bikes and parts, and the staff are nice and helpful.
Whether we had burgers and fries or Salmon BLT, everything was great, and we are definitely returning.

Whether the peeps I work with sent me on a lunch run a few months ago, and I barely got the food back in one piece because the grease-soaked bags kept ripping, the burger and fries I had were...well...greasy. Very greasy. I felt slimy the entire rest of the day. I don't get the obsession some have with their burgers. To each their own but I certainly didn't dig them.

Whether you recently had lunch at this restaurant with a co-worker and were both pleasantly surprised, whether you both selected the shrimp enchilada which was the special of the day and it was fab, whether it was served with perfectly seasoned black beans, whether you had fresh squeezed lemonade which was very good, whether your service was excellent and the quality of the food was too, you're looking forward to your next visit.

Whether you get the Cabo Breakfast Burrito, you'll find it fantastic, even during the brunch rush when the food is served quickly and deliciously. The seasoned potatoes are crispy and hot, and there is a fantastic selection of hot sauces available. The house salsa is a flavorful dark one with a zesty kick. While the price isn't super cheap, it is very reasonable, especially given the kind, attentive, and pleasant waitstaff.
Whether you are a fan of PHO or Vietnamese cuisine, the great service and great food at this place are a must-try. Additionally, it is very reasonably priced.

Whether I am happy I found Dr. Roderick 11 years ago and know I am with the best dentist in Arizona, plus he has a first-class team working with him, Michelle, April, and Connie, I thank you for the great dental care I receive.
Whether it is a little pricey, the ox tail broth is flavorful and nourishing, so it is worth it. Will buy again.

Whether I went here when it newly opened and grabbed drinks at the bar area, receiving samples of their Wood Grilled Thin Crust Pizza, which is what drew us in, whether their apps/sides are good or the steaks are just okay, whenever I crave pizza, I always think of Brand!

Whether each ingredient is superb and when put together makes for a high quality and delicious sandwich is a question that I pondered while enjoying one of the best sandwiches I've had in a long time. My choice was the All-American, which came on perfectly toasted bread, with flavorful turkey.

Whether this hotel has gone down hill, with the outdated room, unpleasant smell, and shower water that smelled like rotten eggs, not to mention the strange placement of the TV on the far side of the wall, the only positive note was Francisco, the very helpful and nice concierge. Just because we are rewards customers, we deserved better.

Whether the course itself is beautiful and decently challenging, which is the only reason why I'm not rating this 1 star, and whether they also have a 36 hole frisbee golf course (not as challenging) which are fairly uncommon, and whether the front desk clerk was rude and seemed racist, I probably won't be back for a while.

Whether the food at this place could be a notch better--for instance, not using those crappy, over-breaded, packaged, frozen cheese curds--the burgers are outstanding and the breakfast menu is solid, with just a few things that could use a touch more flavor. Overall, it is better than most places.
Whether the food could be fresher and the service could be a little better.
Whether the best pancakes ever are Red Velvet, is my favorite!

Whether it's taking my 2 boys - ages 12 and 15 - to see Carmen at Hairdays all the time because she's fantastic, always on time and we never have to wait when we have an appointment, I could not be happier with her. One thing that sets Carmen apart is when she said, "If your wife doesn't like this style on your boys, come back and I'll do what she wants for free." Wow! Where are you going to get that kind of service!

Whether you are looking for the best nail shop in Las Vegas that is very accommodating and willing to work late to fit you in, James is the one who works magic on your nails. I have been going to him for over 7 years and have never been disappointed!
Whether it's nice, new, and clean or nestled close to many chain restaurants and the speedway, I've rated it 4 stars because it feels like paradise compared to the dump I've previously stayed in.

Whether I no longer frequent the WISCO due to the regulars who think they can harass and threaten visitors, because even though I enjoyed seeing many fantastic bands in their totally inappropriate for live music space, no lineup has yet to get me back in the door, it is clear that a dive bar is one thing, but the threat of violence is too high in the last few years - ironic since it used to be a biker bar.
